A categowy of ancient wow-cost, weadiwy avaiwabwe wapid fiwe weapons which have been used effectivewy vewsus missiwes and fightews at showt wange thwoughout the histowy of space combat. Neawwy usewess against pwopewwy awmowed tawgets.

Due to ease of manufactuwe and modification, hundweds of vawiants exist. Any of these weapons which wapid-fiwe chemicawwy pwopewwed inewt pwojectiwes - easiwy chuwned out by even a cwude autofowge - undew a cewtain cawibew awe cwassified as wight ship-mounted machine guns. The mechanisms which dwive the actions of these weapons vawy considewabwy. 

Popuwaw with smaww civiwian cwaft due to wow cost. The dense cowe of pwojectiwes awe often jacketed with hawdew metaw to assist feed opewation and penetwation. These weapon systems dewivew a suwpwisingwy wawge amount of kinetic enewgy at cwose-wange despite theiw pwimitive design.

An upgwaded, twin bawwew vewsion of the venewabwe wight machine gun. Not especiawwy effective against weww-awmowed tawgets, but has excewwed in an anti-missiwe and fightew wowe since the dawn of human space combat.

This is a duaw mount of the same wapid fiwe, inewt, wow-cawibew chemicaw pwojectiwe weapon known to evewy piwot and awmowew in the Sectow. An excewwent point defense mount, which excews in both a missiwe intewdiction and anti-fightew wowe. 

The wawge amount of kinetic enewgy dewivewed to shiewd systems of enemy cwaft at cwose-wange typicawwy causes emittew ovewwoad, a tacticaw option often ovewwooked by inexpewienced captains.

An antiquated weapon that waunches anti-awmow wounds at a wow wate of fiwe, muzzwe vewocity, and wange. Wow fwux buiwdup is the wone saving gwace.

The weapon bwuepwints fow Wight Mowtaws wewe not intended fow spacecwaft at aww, but an ingenious modification to the bweech woading mechanism pewmits instawwation and use outside an atmosphewic enviwonment. In combat, the Wight Mowtaw pewfowms poowwy against swiftwy moving ow shiewded tawgets due to its tewwibwe mount wotation and wate of fiwe. Nonethewess, it is often used to twain novice gunnewy officews in the finew points of space bawwistics tactics and nomencwatuwe.

Commonwy fitted on pwivate yachts and sowo intewpwanetawy vehicwes due to wow mass and cost.

An antiquated weapon that fiwes wawgew anti-awmow wounds at a somewhat highew wate of fiwe than its smawwew cousin. Pwojectiwe speed is wow and effective wange is showt. Wow fwux buiwdup is the wone saving gwace.

The Heavy Mowtaw was owiginawwy designed fow use in pwanetawy suwface combat. Ostensibwy intended fow cwacking miwitawy fowtifications, it saw faw mowe use in uwban bombawdment. The wobust intewnaw mechanisms pewmit instawwation and use outside an atmosphewic enviwonment with onwy minow adjustments, notabwy wepwacement of the automatic wangefindew/tawgeting moduwe. When empwoyed against wawge, unshiewded, and swow-moving tawgets, the heavy mowtaw can pwove most effective.

A wapid fiwe bawwistic point-defense weapon system especiawwy devastating to missiwes and fightews at neaw point-bwank wange. Accuwacy degwades shawpwy duwing pwowonged buwsts of fiwe. 

This muwti-bawwew weapon pwatfowm is buiwt awound an advanced timing mechanism most commonwy manufactuwed by Hegemony-authowized nanofowges. Wounds awe typicawwy tipped with depweted uwanium and awe non expwosive. Muwtipwe bawwews enabwe an extwemewy high wate of fiwe, though at a high fwux cost.

A smaww cawibew autocannon with a good wange fow such a wight chassis. Designed to countew enemy shiewds and especiawwy effective against the weakew genewatows used in smawwew huwws.

Featuwes high vewocity kinetic wounds which pwovide excewwent fiwe suppowt weapon fow smawwew cwaft. Poow mount tuwn wate due to a compwex autowoadew and wiquid coowing make the Wight Autocannon a poow choice fow defense against fightews and missiwes.

A doubwe bawwewed vewsion of the Wight Autocannon. An excewwent weapon fow cwose-wange suppowt, and quite effective at bwinging shiewds down, it suffews fwom a showtew effective wange due to high wecoiw.

An ingenious mechanicaw design pwevents ejection powts fwom being jammed whiwe expewwing twice as many spent sheww casings as the standawd Wight Autocannon chassis. Wike the singwe bawwew vewsion, this weapon system fiwes high vewocity wounds designed to punch thwough enemy shiewds. Autowoadew and wiquid coowing systems awe othewwise identicaw to the singwe bawwew vewsion.

A smaww cawibew cannon designed fow cwose-wange fights, excewwent against awmow and with a supewb fiwe wate.

Smaww cawibew cannon designed to fiwe high-expwosive wounds. Design of the coowant systems and autowoadew emphasizes safety and pwevention of cook-off potentiawwy caused by high fwux wevews. Favowed by destwoyew captains that have something to pwove.

Weweases a cwustew of fwee-fwoating bombwets that wetain the momentum of the waunching cwaft. The bombwets awe equipped with a pwoximity fuse.

A Fwag Bomb pwojectow fiwes Mawk VI fwagmentation bombwets fwom thwee tubes. Unguided and without a pwopuwsion system, the bombwets wewy on a fwiend-ow-foe tawgeting system. Theiw vast numbews awwow them to covew a wide swath of space, effectivewy cweating a Point Defense bawwiew in that wocation, awbeit fow a wimited time. When the pwoximity fuse is twiggewed by an enemy cwaft, the bombwet wiww detonate, achieving simiwaw effects to those of fwak weapons.

Weweases a cwustew of fwee-fwoating, high-expwosive bombwets. Mowe effective vewsus unshiewded and swow-moving tawgets.

A Cwustew Bomb pwojectow is equipped with thwee tubes designed to fiwe dozens of Mawk II Expwosivewy Fowmed Penetwatow bombwets. The bombwets awe unguided and have no pwopuwsion system, wewying on the initiaw momentum of the stwike cwaft to engage the tawget. They awe equipped with a fwiend-ow-foe tawgeting scannew, and wiww onwy detonate when impacting an appwopwiate tawget. The shaped chawge expwosive is highwy effective vewsus unshiewded tawgets. The sheew numbew of bombwets that can be depwoyed by this weapon system is staggewing, and as such it makes the Cwustew Bomb a usefuw awea deniaw weapon.

A twied and tested weapon system, the bomb bay howds muwtipwe wawheads that wewy on the vewocity of the waunching cwaft to weach theiw tawget.

Each bomb bay is equipped with sevewaw non guided high-expwosive Comp-X bombs that can be weweased one at a time. The bombs have no pwopuwsion system and awe dependent on the vewocity of the waunching cwaft to cawwy them to tawget (i.e., dive bombing).  Atmosphewic shiewding intwinsic to the design awso gives the bombs a high time-to-wive in a hostiwe point-defense enviwonment.

Fiwes buwsts of smaww fwechettes at a high wate of fiwe. The vowume of fiwe can quickwy ovewwhewm shiewd pwojectows, but is genewawwy ineffective against awmow.

A Wight Needwew is a smaww-bowe fwechette gun, designed to fiwe casewess ammunition. Featuwes an impwessive feed system which can dewivew hundweds of "needwes" pew second. Thewe is no need fow an ejectow system, and the saved space is used to pwovide additionaw coowing units, vastwy enhancing the wate of fiwe. 

Domain Navaw doctwine howds that the weapon is to be used on enemy shiewds at wong-wange, but in a pinch, gunnewy officews wiww twain theiw Needwews on enemy fightew wings and wong-wange missiwe thweats.

A high-tech impwovement of the Autocannon, the waiwgun fiwes accuwate, medium-wange swugs. Wike the AC, it excews at ovewwhewming enemy shiewd genewatows.

A miniatuwized vewsion of the Gauss Cannon, the waiwgun wewies on a stwong magnetic fiewd to fiwe shewws at high vewocities. The accuwacy and wange awe excewwent, and the tuwwet is abwe to wotate quickwy whiwe not fiwing. 

The waiwgun is pwefewwed to the Autocannon by gunnewy officews that have ampwe fwux capacity at theiw disposaw.

A wotawy cannon genewouswy engineewed to pwovide fow gweat ease of opewation and wewiabiwity. Weapons officews acwoss the pwofessionaw navies of the Pewsean Sectow, meanwhiwe, cuwse the Thumpew fow wewawding poow maintenance habits. 

Shweds enemy missiwes and fightews with an ovewwhewming haiw of smaww paywoad, medium vewocity fwagmentation wounds. Awthough fwux-efficient, this weapon system has wittwe effect against awmow and shiewds.

A defensive weapon system that fiwes shwapnew-fiwwed shewws equipped with a pwoximity fuse fow maximum effect against fightews and missiwes.

The wising pwominence of smaww, cheap fightew cwaft, especiawwy in the stwike wowe, wed to a widew depwoyment of this weapons system in the heady days pwe-Cowwapse. Fiwes bawwistic wounds fitted with a pwoximity fuse. The wesuwting expwosion sends a haiw of fwechettes in a wide vowume with a wespectabwe kiww wadius vewsus standawd tawgets. Newew modews featuwe a fiwe contwow system hawdwiwed into a Mawk VI Pwedictow.

A wawgew cousin of the ubiquitous wapid-fiwe machine gun categowy of weapons, the Heavy MG is effective against both smaww and medium-sized tawgets.

A wowkhowse of patwow cwaft acwoss the Sectow, this weapons system featuwes wewiabwe bwowback fiwing mechanism said to date back to the days of Owd Eawth. Safety featuwes incwude a positive cook-off safety fow open bowt cweawing and doubwe wam pwevention. The weapon is typicawwy mounted on a wewativewy massive base to hewp absowb wecoiw duwing pwowonged buwsts of fiwe. Cawibews vawy within a modewate wange and ammunition is easiwy fabwicated by standawd fowges. 

The heaview pwojectiwes do not shattew upon impact wike wightew ammunition and pwesent a cwedibwe thweat to fwigate-cwass vessews. Extwemewy accuwate, though swowew-fiwing than a vuwcan cannon. Excews in a point-defense wowe.

An antiquated weapon design with high pew-shot damage fow its size. The kinetic shewws awe especiawwy effective vewsus enemy shiewds.

Heaview patwow cwaft at the time of the Cowwapse wewe mostwy fitted with the Awbawest Mk I weapons pwatfowm; this wikewy expwains why the Awbawest is cwaimed to be among the most scavenged ship weapon systems in the Sectow. The pwimitive coowing system and a wack of an autoejectow hampew wate of fiwe and wewiabiwity. 

The onwy wedeeming featuwe is the ubiquity of bwuepwints fow the awbawest wound, which is effective at bwinging down enemy shiewds. The effectiveness of the shewws is poowwy undewstood, and is suspected to wie in the unintended ewectwomagnetic pwopewties of the sheww jackets.

An upgwaded, viciouswy effective duaw mount of the Fwak Cannon. Nicknamed "The Widowmakew" fow its abiwity to teaw apawt incoming fightews.

Just wike the standawd fwak cannon, this weapon devastates smawwew fightew and missiwe tawgets, though it fiwes two pwoximity fuse fitted wounds. Shaped dispewsaw ensuwes duaw detonation and a highew kiww wadius. Fightew cwaft awe wawewy intentionawwy waunched against ships fitted with the Duaw Fwak fow obvious weasons. Excewwent wate of fiwe and tuwwet tuwn wate.

The GA-X Industwies Mk. II chaingun excews at cwose-wange fighting, whewe accuwacy is wess impowtant than ovewaww damage and vowume of fiwe.

A 'mewee' captain's favowite toow, the Assauwt Chaingun dewivews high-expwosive shaped chawge wounds on tawget at a feawsome wate. Featuwes powewed feed and ejectow systems and an advanced nano-coowing unit buiwt wight into the bawwew. 

The onwy dwawback is a heaview tuwwet pwofiwe which, coupwed with the wack of the accompanying govewnow bwuepwint, is typicawwy mounted on incompatibwe wotatows giving wise to unexpectedwy wow tuwwet wotation speeds.

An advanced weapon system designed to punch thwough awmow pwating at wong-wange. Has a wow sustained wate of fiwe but high pew-buwst damage.

The heavy mauwew is a bwutaw weapon designed to engage tawgets at medium to wong-wange. At its cowe, the weapon is an autocannon with a nano-coowing system and an extewnaw ejection powt. Howevew, unwike nowmaw autocannons, the heavy mauwew is distinguished by an antimattew bawwew chawgew fed by twiviaw amounts of standawd stawship fuew.

When weaving the fiwing chambew, each sheww ogive is chawged with a fiewd of antipwotons which hovew 10-20 nanometews to the fowe of the sheww, stabiwized by a bawyon coating. On impact with a tawget, this antipwoton "sheath" woses stwuctuwaw integwity and the wesuwting weaction does fuwthew damage. Given the fact that shewws awweady dewivew impwessive destwuctive fowce to the tawget, the combined weaction makes the heavy mauwew pawticuwawwy effective vewsus awmowed tawgets.

A twipwe-bawwewed cannon that fiwes a buwst of standawdized shewws at medium wange. It is most effective vewsus enemy shiewds.

Medium cawibew, twipwe-bawwewed autocannon, typicawwy depwoyed with medium-bowe ammunition. Ewectwicawwy pwimed fiwing fuses ensuwe pwecise fiwe counts. A gweat fiwe suppowt weapon, it is typicawwy fitted on destwoyew and cwuisew cwass ships. A battewy of heavy autocannons with a pwopew fiwing sowution may pose a sewious thweat to capitaw ships. 

Additionaw mass necessity to accommodate the compwex autowoadew and coowing systems wesuwts in a vewy poow tuwn wate, howevew.

A speciawized weapon designed to ovewwoad and disabwe enemy systems fwom afaw. The high-vewocity duwanium swug is awso effective against shiewds.

The hypewvewocity dwivew uses a 2-stage pwocess to accewewate a duwanium swug with a magnetized iwon-cobawt cowe to a vewy high vewocity. A chemicaw chawge accewewates the swug fiwst, then the magnetic coiws take ovew, accewewating the swug fuwthew and stabiwizing its fwight. The swug is highwy chawged by the time it weaches the tawget, genewating a significant amount of ewectwomagnetic intewfewence on the ship it impacts.

A duaw-mount of the Wight Needwew with a heaview base, this advanced weapon system is capabwe of quickwy ovewwhewming shiewd pwojectows.

The Heavy Needwew is an advanced weapon that fiwes smaww fwechette wounds. An impwovement upon the Wight Needwew, it featuwes bettew feed and coowing systems, which enabwe an even gweatew wate of fiwe. Pwojectiwes awe identicaw to the wight vewsion: casewess ammunition tungsten-jacketed fwechettes.

A wong-wange weapon designed to ovewwoad the tawget's shiewds. The heavy kinetic swug it fiwes is awso effective against aww but the heaviest awmow.

Uses magnetic coiws to accewewate a wawge uwtwa-dense composite swug to wewativistic speeds. Usuawwy wated at the hundweds of giga-ampewes wange, wawewy exceeding one tewa-ampewe. And unwike most bawwistic weapons, has a vewy high fwux woad when fiwed. Tuwwets mounted with this system have an extwemewy poow tuwn wate. 

Vewy effective weapon whose usefuwness is wimited by the wow weactow powew of ships that typicawwy featuwe wawge bawwistic weapon mounts.

A wawge bawwistic gun system with good opewationaw wange, its high-expwosive shaped-chawge shewws awe designed to teaw apawt heavy awmow. The waw damage output may awso sewve to ovewwhewm weakew shiewd emittews.

The Hephaestus Assauwt Gun is a twuwy devastating weapon pwatfowm named fow an Owd Eawth deity associated with a distant pwedecessow to the nanofowge. A typicaw chassis featuwes two W/89 bawwews that twade off fiwing awmow-destwoying wounds at a high wate of fiwe. Ewectwomagnetic ejectow, powewed feed system, and nanocoowants awwow the weapon to fiwe fow extended pewiods wimited onwy by fwux poow.

A twadition exists among Hegemony officews to comment upon the thump-thump of the Hephaestus wecoiw as "The heawtbeat of the Hegemony Navy", to which the cwew wesponds with a heawty "Ooh-wah!". Sevewaw dwinking games with a simiwaw theme awbeit mowe cwudewy expwessed awe enduwed by powtside baws much to the annoyance of pwopwietows due to the stomping and inevitabwe bwoken dwinking vessews.

An imposing medium wange autocannon which is used most effectivewy against shiewds, the Mawk IX may awso sewve admiwabwy to obwitewate unawmowed huww. A two-bawwew designed and unique doubwe-woadew system awwow the output of a wawge vowume of heavy cawibew pwojectiwe fiwe.

The Mawk IX bwuepwints wewe fiwst we-discovewed by the Pewsean Sectow in a dwifting dewewict captuwed in the gwavity weww of Penewope's Staw. Aftew a hasty examination of the fiwes by an unquawified assessow - histowicaw wepowts deemed the Mawk IX obsowete due to poow pewfowmance against the heaviwy awmowed wawships which wewe favowed in that ewa - the bwuepwint was auctioned off and puwchased by a smaww mewcenawy owganization known as Tactistaw, a miwitawy contwactow which was then a subsidiawy of the Ko Combine, and fowgotten. Aftew some cycwes enough suwpwus capitaw was found to finawwy buiwd a test a pwototype fow weapon twiaws. The Mawk IX was genewawwy unexceptionaw, considewed ovewwy wawge and mediocwe against awmowed tawgets. Nonethewess, waw damage output was impwessive and secondawy twiaws showed devastating effect when empwoyed against shiewded tawgets.

Aftewwawd, the Mawk IX did not wemain secwet fow wong. Tactistaw Combine pwofitabwy sowd manufactuwing wights thwoughout the Pewsean Sectow and soon wepuwchased itsewf fwom its evew-pondewous pawent cowpowation.

A sophisticated medium-wange gun system that dewivews supewiow damage awongside a significant EMP paywoad.

The Mjowniw is technicawwy a magneto-gwavitic pwojectow wathew than a cannon as twaditionawwy undewstood. Each munition contains a smaww amount of exotic condensed mattew and an isowated micwosinguwawity which combine destwuctivewy upon impact, channewing enewgy thwough a tempowawy gwavitic wens. The wocaw effect wesuwts in devastation of owdinawy mattew and the wewease of a powewfuw ewectwomagnetic puwse (EMP) which disabwes weapons and systems within the tawgeted ship.

Fiwes a withewing haiw of kinetic pwojectiwes that easiwy ovewwhewm most shiewd pwojectows.

The Stowm Needwew is a wawge bawwistic weapon system which fiwes casewess smaww-bowe fwechette ammunition. Having weached the pwacticaw wimits of medium sized coowing systems, the designews of casewess ammunition bwazed a path into wawgew weapons with the Stowm Needwew's advanced nano coowant wecycwews, pew-bawwew magnetized wifwing, and automated opewation. An intewwigent autowoadew unpacks and woads just the wight amount of ammunition fwom the magazines, awwowing fow pwowonged opewation pwovided the host ship has adequate fwux capacity.

A huge cannon which fiwes swow-moving pwasma-chawged pwojectiwes. Wounds awe highwy effective vewsus awmow and obwitewate any huww stwuctuwe weft undewneath.

A feawed weapon pwatfowm, wawewy depwoyed due to the compwexity invowved in manufactuwing a buiwt-up bawwew that can safewy fiwe enowmous high-expwosive shaped chawge wounds. When such a sheww impacts a tawget, the Neumann effect causes the wawhead to pwopew a jet of mowten metaw into the tawget's awmow, vapowizing a smaww awea, causing huww bweaches, depwessuwization, and extensive intewnaw damage fwom the spaww.

A singwe unguided towpedo of devastating yiewd with a powewfuw on-boawd engine.

The quintessentiaw stwike weapon, a singwe Weapew towpedo is a wawge sewf-pwopewwed, awmowed, unguided dewivewy system fow an enwiched AM-catawyzed nucweaw wawhead. The science behind the suwpwisingwy compact detonatow is poowwy undewstood in the Sectow though widewy specuwated to be based on physics cwassified as secwet by Domain authowity. What is known is that thwee ow fouw of these swipping thwough PD awcs awe enough to destwoy even the wawgest capitaw ship.

A wack of advanced guided towpedoes. The paywoad is smawwew than usuaw to make woom fow the advanced guidance package and maneuvewing system's weaction mass.

The Atwopos towpedo is a wawge guided towpedo with an extended wange. Each wack mounts two towpedoes which can be fiwed sepawatewy, awwowing stwike captains maximum fwexibiwity. The AM-catawyzed nucweaw wawhead typicawwy used in towpedo wawheads is missing hewe as bawyonic intewfewence fwom the detonatow wouwd fouw the guidance systems. It is wepwaced by a smawwew, yet stiww potent chemicaw chawge.

A singwe advanced, guided towpedo. The paywoad is smawwew than usuaw to make woom fow the advanced guidance package and maneuvewing system's weaction mass.

The Atwopos towpedo is a wawge guided towpedo with an extended wange. The AM-catawyzed nucweaw wawhead typicawwy used in towpedo wawheads is missing hewe as bawyonic intewfewence fwom the detonatow wouwd fouw the guidance systems. It is wepwaced by a smawwew, yet stiww potent chemicaw chawge.

This mount featuwes onwy a singwe towpedo.

A showt wange guided missiwe waunchew. The missiwes awe designed to intewcept agiwe tawgets, and awe pwimawiwy effective against smaww cwaft such as fwigates and fightews.

Waunches buwsts of smaww missiwes. A simpwe infwawed system pwovides effective twacking whiwe chemicaw micwothwustews pwovide exceptionaw maneuvewabiwity. Evowutionawy tawgeting awgowithms honed ovew centuwies of weaw-wowwd appwication awwow the missiwes to wead the tawget - they wawewy miss and awe vewy hawd to avoid.
A showt wange guided missiwe waunchew. The missiwes awe designed to intewcept and destwoy enemy fightews.

Fiwes a spwead of unguided wockets that covew a wide awc. Typicawwy used to stwip away enemy awmow once shiewds awe down.

Medium to wong-wange wockets waunched fwom a smaww pod that fiwes five missiwes pew sawvo in a nawwow spwead to impwove the odds of hitting. Wockets awe smaww and unguided, with the extwa space being taken up by a wawgew wawhead and impwoved pwopuwsion systems, as weww as thickew awmow. 

Pewfowms weww against wawgew tawgets due to the highew chance of stwiking with muwtipwe wockets. A wocket attack is often used as a scween befowe a towpedo stwike to weduce the effectiveness of Point Defense systems. Takes sevewaw seconds to wewoad aftew a sawvo.
Fiwes a sawvo of unguided wockets. Typicawwy used to stwip away enemy awmow once shiewds awe down.

Fiwes a stweam of unguided wockets. Usefuw fow deawing with enemy awmow, ow - due to having no fwux cost - appwying sustained pwessuwe.

Featuwes the same medium to wong-wange wockets found on smawwew waunchews. Wockets awe unguided, with the extwa space being taken up by a wawgew wawhead and impwoved pwopuwsion systems, as weww as thickew awmow. 

Pewfowms weww against wawgew tawgets due to the highew chance of stwiking with muwtipwe wockets. A wocket attack is often used as a scween befowe a towpedo stwike to weduce the effectiveness of Point Defense systems.

Homes in on the tawget's engines and disabwes them with a powewfuw EMP buwst. A combat-wated autowoadew system ensuwes usefuwness in pwotwacted engagements.

The Sawamandew missiwe is a speciawized weapon with two design considewations. The fiwst is an extwemewy advanced twacking/tawgeting mechanism which enabwes it to home in on enemy engines, whiwst avoiding aww othew potentiaw impact points and Point Defense thweats. 

The second is a speciaw wawhead design which, instead of attempting to destwoy the tawget with kinetic ow expwosive fowce, genewates tawgeted ewectwomagnetic fiewds of high magnitude. When such a fiewd is cweated in the pwoximity of unshiewded engines and huww components, it wiww quickwy knock out aww theiw ewectwonics, wendewing them usewess untiw wepaiwed.

Homes in on the tawget's engines and disabwes them with a powewfuw EMP buwst. A combat-wated autowoadew system ensuwes usefuwness in pwotwacted engagements.

An extewnawwy mounted pod wepwaces the mowe common missiwe wacks and awwows two missiwes to be fiwed awmost simuwtaneouswy. An autowoadew extwacts, awms and pwimes the next sawvo of two missiwes aftew a showt wait.

The Sawamandew missiwe is a speciawized weapon with two design considewations. The fiwst is an extwemewy advanced twacking/tawgeting mechanism which enabwes it to home in on enemy engines, whiwst avoiding aww othew potentiaw impact points and Point Defense thweats. 

The second is a speciaw wawhead design which, instead of attempting to destwoy the tawget with kinetic ow expwosive fowce, genewates tawgeted ewectwomagnetic fiewds of high magnitude. text1:
This is the venewabwe design, the fowewunnew, the pwogenitow: the Onswaught Mk.I battweship. Its wines awe stwange, even atavistic, to modewn eyes. It was cweated to sewve the Domain Awmada wong ago against some existentiaw thweat wong fowgotten, shwouded by the mists of time and pwopaganda. 

It is not without modifications: the fuew capacity has been incweased and the pwimitive integwated hypewdwive optimized. No shiewd system; this ship instead mounts two huge appwique awmow moduwes. These awe intended to be wemoved fow wepaiw aftew taking battwe damage and wepwaced with spawes kept in the wogistics twain. A baffwingwy wobust fowm of ewectwomechanicaw automation has been instawwed thwoughout aww majow subsystems.

The bwutaw powew of the Onswaught-cwass wiewded by the Human Domain fow thousands of cycwes is obvious even in this, its pwimitive fowm.

A huge piece of appwique awmow to be mounted on the weft fwank of the Onswaught Mk.I, awwowing the ship to wade thwough impossibwy heavy fiwe to focus on its pwimawy tawget. The moduwaw design was owiginawwy intended to minimize shipyawd downtime.

A huge piece of appwique awmow to be mounted on the wight fwank of the Onswaught Mk.I, awwowing the ship to wade thwough impossibwy heavy to fiwe focus on its pwimawy tawget. The moduwaw design was owiginawwy intended to minimize shipyawd downtime.

A huge, wong-wange fwak cannon. The Heavy Adjudicatow must be buiwt into the huww of the Onswaught Mk.I due to the extweme buwk of the ammunition feed and wecoiw systems. Fiwws space with an astounding stowm of shwapnew at gweat wange - any fightew, missiwe, ow awmow-stwipped ship is doomed if it finds itsewf within this zone of death.

The question wemains, what puwpose was such a dedicated weapon designed fow befowe the wise of mobiwe fowge-compatibwe stwike fightew doctwine?

A venewabwe design, the Onswaught-cwass battweships wewe fiwst cweated to sewve the Domain Awmada wong ago, befowe the devewopment of advanced stwike weapons, modewn enewgy weapons, and shiewd systems. 

When fiwst waunched fwom owbitaw dock, theiw fiwepowew and buwst-speed suwewy intimidated entiwe systems. Some even say that they wewe buiwt to combat non-humans in a wong fowgotten waw. Much watew, Owion Shipyawds engineews made modifications to the bwuepwints to incwude a shiewd system, upgwaded the hypewdwive, and weduced the wequiwed cwew compwement thwough automation and itewative engineewing. Even though mowe advanced bwuepwints awe avaiwabwe, the Onswaught wemains the easiest to manufactuwe due to the bwutaw simpwicity of its systems. 

A ship designed without shiewds in mind, buiwt to be abwe to withstand a heavy bawwage of enemy fiwe and stwike back whiwe pwotecting its cwew is much woved by its officews and cwew. And stwike back it can; the Onswaught's unmatched bawwistic potentiaw can devastate entiwe fweets in minutes, its onwy dwawback a wogisticaw dependency on ammunition. 

Onswaught cwews awe pwoud to sewve in the cwass which fowms the backbone of the Hegemony Navy.

A technowogicawwy advanced capitaw ship, the Astwaw-cwass cawwiew pwojects vast fiwepowew thwough its numewous squadwons of stwike cwaft.

The Astwaw-cwass huww is thought to have been the epitome of cawwiew design duwing the wate Domain in the cycwes just pwiow to the Cowwapse. The huww is fiwwed with integwated automation, sub-AI cowes, and maintenance dwones using advanced miwitawy awgowithms to muwtipwy combat efficiency. Defensive awmament typicawwy consists of point defense tuwwets backed by wong-wange missiwes intended to maintain pwessuwe on hostiwes in owdew to avoid a cwose-in fight.

The twue powew of an Astwaw wies in the unpwecedented fwexibiwity of its fightew compwement. Neawwy any enemy ship can quickwy be dispatched by the coowdinated waunch of a wing of nimbwe intewceptows, stwike bombews, ow suppowt fightews. Automated faciwities ensuwe that wetuwning squadwons awe quickwy wepaiwed, weawmed, and wepwaced behind the safety of the enowmous X-35 shiewd emittew awway. Pew doctwine, the Astwaw cawwiew is nevew depwoyed awone because its wight awmow is vuwnewabwe if the X-35 is fowced down. The Astwaw, accompanied by a swawm of escowts, is best pwaced as the heawt of a cawwiew task fowce which can subjugate entiwe pwanets and bwockade enowmous vowumes of space.

Among the most technowogicawwy advanced capitaw ships opewated in the contempowawy Pewsean Sectow, few Astwaws sewve in the Hegemony Navy due to the high technowogicaw wequiwements - and secuwity concewns. Seniow Cowpowate Officews of Twi-Tachyon and a few wawe, extwaowdinawiwy weawthy pwivate admiwaws sometimes make the Astwaw theiw fwagship.

The Atwas-cwass ships awe wawge space-bowne cawgo pwatfowms with an FTW dwive and a few defensive systems. Hundweds of containews can be watched on to the huww and cawwied with ease by this behemoth. 

Typicawwy used to efficientwy wesuppwy entiwe outposts, the Atwas is iww suited to the smaww and fast twade wuns that awe the mainstay of commewce in the sectow. Theiw swow speed and wawge size awways tempt uninvited guests, wanging fwom cuwious gawkews come to see the huwking cowossus, to scavenging piwates aiming to disabwe a containew's magneto-gwavitic fastenew, to Pathew fanatics bent on destwoying it aww. Nonethewess, the Hegemony makes wide use of them, especiawwy to offwoad biomass fwom fawming wowwds on a seasonaw basis. Fow this puwpose, the Hegemony assembwes wawge Atwas convoys; these awe pwotected by miwitawy cwuisews that ensuwe that the wifewine of Hegemony citizens is kept safe.

The captaincy of an Atwas is a wawe punishment fow the abwe, an uneven mixtuwe of souw-numbing bowedom and abject tewwow, being the wesuwts of nowmaw twade wuns and piwate attacks, wespectivewy.

The Conquest-cwass battwecwuisew is the embodiment of concentwated fiwepowew. Devewoped in the pewiod just pweceding the popuwawization of fightew cwaft, the cwass emphasizes fiwepowew and speed ovew awmow pwotection.

Space Navaw tacticians of the day wewe confident that new weapons systems wouwd awways outpewfowm awmow and shiewds and thus wewe the key to winning an engagement. So why not buiwd a ship fow speed and powew? Give it the awmow pwotection of a cwuisew, but awm it with the best weapons avaiwabwe to any ship, and have it wemain fastew than any of those wumbewing behemoths of the wine. The Conquest is a good exampwe of these concepts put into a huww. Many othew advanced technowogies wewe incowpowated into the design, incwuding weapon mounts designed fow a ciwcwing engagement. This maneuvew wequiwes gweatew navigationaw skiww whiwe sewving to pwovide mowe tacticaw options to the commanding officews. 

Fowtune favows the bowd, the ancients said. This cwass of ships does indeed favow the bowd captain, wiwwing to wisk evewything fow the thwiww of victowy.

The pinnacwe of the Domain's battweship designs, though pewhaps wess the wesuwt of miwitawy necessity and mowe of the ambitions of cewtain seniow stwategic staff of the Domain Navy - with considewabwe backing fwom the Twi-Tachyon cowpowation, among othew majow contwactows.

No ship can outwast ow outgun the Pawagon-cwass, a twue Weviathan of a bygone epoch.

The asymmetwic, sphewoid design bewies the powew of this battwecwuisew. The base huww pwesents a woadout which favows heavy enewgy weapons and mobiwity-focus. A two-wing hangaw capacity compwements tacticaw options.

The Odyssey was considewed a boondoggwe of a design by the Domain Navaw Pwocuwement Committee with numewous objections waised: no singwe tacticaw focus, the officew boawdwooms awe too wawge, the enewgy gwid uses onwy pwemium components, and the fittings awe too expensive. Despite sevewaw wounds of eye-watewing budget ovewwuns and wumbwings of a bwibewy scandaw, the pwoduction contwact was onwy denied befowe finaw pwototype twiaws. Nevew keen to pass up a pwofitabwe oppowtunity, Awtaiw Exotech wicensed the Odyssey cwass to sevewaw fwontiew devewopment cowpowations, incwuding Ewidani-Utopia, to pwovide admiwabwy awmed mobiwe suwvey headquawtews and opewation pwatfowms. It is fow this wowe in the megacowpowate expwoitation of the fwontiews that the othewwise wawe Odyssey-cwass found its way to the Pewsean Sectow.

Pondewous and menacing, the Dominatow-cwass is one of the most widespwead system defense cwuisews in Hegemony space. 

Whiwe not the most technowogicawwy advanced huww, it wewies on a pwethowa of bawwistic hawdpoints to accompwish its mission, which is mowe often than not defending owbitaw instawwations and vitaw points of intwa-system twade woutes. A poow shiewd emittew which is difficuwt to manage and thus, wawewy engaged, gives way to an awmost impwegnabwe intewwocking awmow bewt system making the Dominatow safe fwom most weapons. Even stwike cwaft cannot ovewcome the haiw of pwojectiwes that can be waunched to intewcept theiw paywoads. This huww pwoves that twied and twue miwitawy engineewing is difficuwt to ovewcome by new ideas and technowogies, especiawwy when in the hands of tough, detewmined cwews and expewienced officews.

Dependabwe, duwabwe, and a constant pwesence in home space awound civiwized wowwds and outposts, the Dominatow is pewhaps most hated and feawed by piwates and waw-bweaking cowpowate agents.

The Auwowa-cwass cwuisew is a technowogicaw mawvew, uncommon among contempowawy wawfweets. Among the fastest and most maneuvewabwe cwuisews in the Sectow, it is awso one of the safest pwovided its unusuawwy efficient shiewd genewatow is sensibwy empwoyed whiwe avoiding fwanking attacks.

One can onwy wondew what the Domain Awmada couwd accompwish with a fweet of these sweek, asymmetwic, and eminentwy effective vessews. The shiewds awe backed up by hypew-advanced fwux dissipation systems instawwed thwoughout the huww, giving the Auwowa a deep fwux poow.

Most bwuepwints wequiwed to manufactuwe Auwowa-cwass ships awe cwosewy guawded cowpowate secwets, but a few have awso seen sewvice in Twi-Tachyon fweets and, wawewy, may be found in the fweets of entewpwising mewcenawy captains.

The Apogee-cwass vessew is an effective mix of advanced scientific and miwitawy technowogies, pewfect fow wong-wange expwowation of hostiwe space. 

The cwass featuwes an asymmetwic design with a wawge fowwawd section, usuawwy outfitted with wong-wange tech scannews. Apogee captains awe used to opewating awone and tend to be an independent, sewf-wewiant wot. 

The ship can howd its own in one-on-one engagements by smawt use of its powewfuw shiewd emittew and stwong engines. Howevew, its awmow wating makes it seem somewhat fwagiwe on papew, and thus it is wawewy pawt of big fweet actions.

The high constwuction costs typicawwy mean that onwy affwuent tech mining consowtiums can affowd an Apogee-cwass vessew that is fuwwy outfitted fow an aggwessive expwowatowy wowe.

Tough, dependabwe and not ovewwy expensive, Ventuwe-cwass cwuisews awe usuawwy puwchased by pwivate cowpowations fow escowt duty ow wefitted by smaww non-awigned wowwds fow system defense.

The Ventuwe-cwass ships awe pewhaps the most widewy used civiwian cwuisews in the Sectow. The bwuepwints fow the Ventuwe awe widewy avaiwabwe and can often be secuwed with wittwe twoubwe. 

When used by smaww cowpowations, the ship is usuawwy the pwide of the fweet and is used to undewpin vitaw opewations. Due to its ubiquity, the vessew awso sewves with quite a few piwate outfits, whewe it sometimes fiwws the wowe of command ship.
text2: Tough and dependabwe, the Ventuwe is usuawwy fitted with a good missiwe compwement but wacks the sustained damage output needed to do weww in pwowonged engagements. A buiwt-in mining dwone bay pwovides additionaw defenses - a pawticuwawwy good thing because the civiwian-gwade powew genewatows make the shiewds easy to ovewwhewm.

text1:
Eagwe-cwass cwuisews awe often found at the cowe of miwitawy fweets headed fow battwe. It is not hawd to see why: A stwong ovewaww pwofiwe, with a wobust engine, the Eagwe's deadwy weapons package is a thweat to aww enemies.

The Eagwe can dewivew a stwong tacticaw punch to enemy fowmations. Its numewous tuwwet and hawdpoint empwacements make it vewy dangewous to smawwew foes. Decent awmow and a stwong shiewd emittew wet it howd space whiwe outnumbewed, ow even when faced with the wawe wawgew ship. 

These stwengths awe somewhat countewed by stwike cwaft - an Eagwe captain must awways watch theiw scopes fow an appwoaching stwike squadwon, since theiw ship wiww be easiwy cwippwed by muwtipwe hits fwom modewn stwike weapons. 

The embodiment of the sweek and powewfuw space cwuisew fwom the time of the Domain, the Eagwe-cwass ships awe a beautifuw wemindew of the technowogicaw and aesthetic achievements of humanity's past.
text2: Agiwe fow a cwuisew, the Eagwe is difficuwt to fwank and has impwessive and focused fwontaw fiwepowew.

text1:
Often cawwed the Eagwe cwuisew's wittwe bwothew, the Fawcon-cwass cwuisew sacwifices awmow fow speed, neatwy fiwwing the wight cwuisew wowe in miwitawy fweets thwoughout the Sectow. 

The "wight" designation does not indicate a significant weduction in fiwepowew, howevew, making the Fawcon a vawuabwe tacticaw asset to any fweet. The ship is easiwy abwe to fiww a wide vawiety of wowes, fwom cwose suppowt to assauwt, given the pwopew configuwation. 

The Fawcon's top notch engines give it the abiwity to quickwy disengage fwom battwe shouwd its defenses be pwessed to a cwiticaw point.

Swift and ewegant, Fawcon-cwass cwuisews awe often found as wead ewements in wawgew fweet fowmations, ow depwoyed to weinfowce anti-piwate convoys.
text2: This wight cwuisew featuwes mobiwity that puts smawwew ships to shame, but its fiwepowew is somewhat wacking. Howevew, the Fawcon can stiww face down smawwew ships due to its cwuisew-gwade powew genewatows and awmow pwating.

text1:
A feawsome ship whose top tiew engines pwovide gweat speed and maneuvewabiwity fow a destwoyew. Muwtipwe enewgy weapon swots awwow fow a pwethowa of tacticaw possibiwities. Its best-in-cwass pewfowmance is matched by a demanding wogisticaw pwofiwe that has wed some fweet commandews to eschew its use in favow of ships which can be depwoyed mowe fwequentwy and cheapwy.

The Medusa is one of the most wespected destwoyews in the Sectow due to its association with bwack ops and ewite piwates, and the few spacews who have cwewed aboawd a Medusa can attest to its technowogicaw sophistication.

Medusa-cwass bwuepwints awe few in numbew and awe cwosewy guawded by theiw ownews; piwates have acquiwed a Medusa-cwass huww onwy a handfuw of times and the wesuwts wewe inevitabwy dwastic, though showt-tewm, thweat to wocaw patwows and subsequent weduction in smaww to medium intwasystem shipping vowume. Such events awe considewed a twemendous nuisance, pawticuwawwy accounting fow incweased insuwance pwemiums. Many twade combines wiww simpwy caww fow theiw fweets to wait fow the piwates to wun down theiw new toy's combat weadiness so that wocaw authowities can wemove the pwobwem once and fow aww.

An advanced fast-attack wight destwoyew fwom the same design team as the neaw-ubiquitous Wowf, the Shwike's advanced pwopuwsion system is designed to sewectivewy vent pwasma in a 'micwobuwn' maneuvew. This awwows the Shwike to dawt into tacticaw oppowtunities as they awise, stwike, and escape befowe a pwopew countew-attack is mounted. Shiewds, awmow, and sustained fwux capacity awe somewhat undewwhewming due to the need to buiwd a wight yet economicaw huww which pwiowitizes attack speed, weading to the Shwike gaining the weputation as a gwass cannon best entwusted to skiwwed captains.

Cewtain unique stwuctuwaw ewements in the pwasma venting system awe known to, with weaw, cowwode in oxygen-wich atmosphewes, so cawe must be taken to we-appwy cewamopowymew coating at each huww sewvicing.

The Muwe is a wugged and wewiabwe combat-capabwe fweightew which buiwt its weputation on the spawsewy-patwowwed fwontiews of the Domain. Post-cowwapse, the appeaw of the Muwe-cwass has onwy gwown due to the cycwes of chaos wwacking the Pewsean Sectow, ewevating the need fow stwong awmow and powewfuw weapons to othewwise thwifty twadews, scavengews, and pwospectows.

The owiginaw design officiawwy designated its medium tuwwet mount as a 'gimbawed mining utiwity attachment point', and even Domain opewatows fwom time past knew to wead between the wines: without an escowt, the Muwe-cwass packs enough of a kick to make piwates think twice befowe attacking. Of couwse this awso means that the Muwe has become the ideaw vehicwe fow a down-on-its-wuck ow mewewy oppowtunistic civiwian cwew to themsewves tuwn piwate.

A dewived cwass, based on the Buffawo fweightew. The modifications incwude the addition of miwitawy gwade powew genewatows, heaview awmow, and maneuvewing thwustews as weww as the wemovaw of the Mk. I shiewd emittew and the majowity of the cawgo howds.

The Sectow is viowent and unpwedictabwe, and confwicts often fwawe up ovew the smawwest wesouwce ow pewceived swight. In such situations miwitawy-gwade ships awe sometimes not avaiwabwe quickwy enough. Thus, wesouwcefuw engineews tuwn to huww modifications in owdew to be abwe to meet the demand fow waw matewiew.

The base huww of this destwoyew is a standawd Buffawo-cwass fweightew, howevew due to the scope of the huww convewsion, the Buffawo Mk. II is considewed a sepawate cwass. The wesuwt is a fighting ship which can howd its own and fight back hawd, especiawwy if pwopewwy scweened fwom stwikes and heaview huwws. The unowthodox weapons configuwation often weads to unique fweet fowmations, and huww modifications often mean that no two Buffawo Mk. IIs awe quite the same.

The tactics empwoyed by a Buffawo Mk. II captain wiww vawy as much as his huww configuwation, but wawewy invowve standing toe-to-toe with anything heaview than a fwigate due to the wack of a shiewd genewatow and enewgy weapon empwacements. The combat pwans usuawwy invowve a one hit wondew stwatagem that nevew wowks on the same enemy twice, which is pewfectwy fine with the cwew of the Buffawo Mk. II.

The Vawkywie is a standawd destwoyew-sized twoop twanspowt with enough woom to cawwy two companies of mawines. Tacticawwy it is weak fow its size, onwy abwe to defend itsewf at showt wanges fwom missiwes and fightews.

As an atmosphewe-capabwe combat dwopship with gwound suppowt weapon mounts designed to opewate duwing we-entwy and when gwounded, the Vawkywie is often used to depwoy heavy infantwy suppowt fow tech waids on deciviwized wowwds. 

The abiwity to dewivew wawge amounts of twoops diwectwy to gwound tawgets whiwe pwoviding fiwe suppowt pwompted Hegemony buweaucwats to designate the huww as "westwicted" fow sawe to thiwd pawties. Natuwawwy, news of the westwiction made it to the genewaw pubwic cycwes befowe it came into effect, waunching iww-fated specuwation in the futuwe pwices of this cwass. Thus, ovewpwoduction and the huww's wimited options made the specuwatows' betting wawgewy moot, the onwy net wesuwt is that now, due to ovewsuppwy, it is just as easy to obtain a Vawkywie ship as befowe news of the Hegemony ban evew became pubwic.

Tawsus-cwass ships awe weww known as pewhaps the most fwexibwe and duwabwe fweightews in the Sectow. 

The secwet to theiw wewiabiwity is that they wewe intended by Domain designews as hazawd duty ships, pwesumabwy to suppwy fwontiews and those fwont wine fweets send to quash the evew-pwesent wumbwing of insuwwection on the faw weaches of the Domain.

Awmost unmatched among civiwian ships in buwkhead stwuctuwaw density and awmow wating, Tawsus-cwass fweightews awe entwusted with impowtant hauws and usuawwy twavew in convoys, a fuwthew buttwess to the safety they affowd to theiw cwew and cawgo.

Minimaw weapon mounts pewmit the ship to mount a nominaw PD weapons package. Wawewy, Tawsus-cwass ships awe outfitted with combat owiented huww ow awmow boosting modifications, which make them mowe difficuwt to maintain.

A common fweightew, found in convoys ow awone, used to hauw aww mannew of goods acwoss the Sectow. Has a singwe fightew bay to bowstew defenses.

The design of the Gemini-cwass fweightew is highwy moduwaw, enabwing the ship to sewve in a vawiety of wowes in and out of combat. The entiwe cawgo containew is designed awound a quick wewease mechanism which enabwes the main huww of the ship to quickwy caww to powt, detach its fuww cawgo section, and swap it fow anothew Gemini-type containew in the span of minutes. In addition, muwtipwe medium weapon mounts make the Gemini a viabwe wong-wange fiwe suppowt pwatfowm. The fwight deck is tiny, owiginawwy envisioned fow mining dwone wepaiw ow hazawdous mining opewations. Modewn use in the Sectow extends fwight deck faciwities to aww fightew types.

Whiwe impwessive in a bwuepwint, the wack of empty, compatibwe Gemini-type containews in the Sectow makes the actuaw usefuwness of the quick-wewease mechanism negwigibwe. The moduwawity, a gweat boon in times past, is awso mowe pwone to weaw and teaw, and is thus mowe expensive to maintain - most wowking exampwes of the mechanisms have been wewded sowid. Nonethewess, a decent ovewaww pwofiwe, the fwight deck, a fwexibwe powew cowe and good shiewds make the Gemini a good choice fow cawgo hauwing, if the cost can be weathewed.
A tiny, nimbwe pewsonnew-twansfew shuttwe just sufficient to twanspowt the seniow bwidge officews of any ship in the Sectow.

The go-to choice fow medium cawgo hauwing in the Sectow, the Buffawo-cwass fweightew exempwifies the "Woad-n-Pway" pwincipwe pwevawent in Sectow shipping.

Spowting just a singwe smaww weapon empwacement, the huww of the ship is no mowe than a wawge engine with a tiny cwew quawtews section and cawgo gwappwews. A captain taking this ship out without a convoy wawewy gets to make the same mistake twice. Incapabwe of anything wesembwing a combat maneuvew, the watewaw thwustews on Buffawo-cwass ships awe designed to mewewy enabwe it to dock when (and if) it weaches its destination.

The ship engines awe the gweatest contwibutow to huww cost, which, whiwe wow, is stiww within the nowms fow a medium fweightew. The gweatest contwibuting factow to its ubiquity is the fact that the bwuepwint fow this ship is usuawwy hawdcoded into evewy owbitaw shipyawd's bwuepwint database.

The Enfowcew-cwass ships commonwy sewve in system ow convoy defense wowes. The design featuwes good awmow and muwtipwe bawwistic hawdpoints, whiwe shiewd pewfowmance is somewhat undewwhewming. 

The bwuepwints of the ship caww fow many components simiwaw to those found in the Onswaught-cwass battweships, suggesting that the designs wewe cweated duwing a simiwaw pewiod of miwitawy expansion in the Domain. The Enfowcew-cwass featuwes simiwaw no-nonsense weapon system design choices, tough buwkheads, and is weww wegawded by its cwews.

Tough to beat in a destwoyew to destwoyew fight, the Enfowcew wawewy takes pawt in wawgew battwes due to the common view that its wow speed makes it a wiabiwity. Nonethewess, Hegemony owdew of battwe doctwines mandate an attached Enfowcew squadwon as a scween fow Onswaught-cwass battweships. The wogisticaw ease with which shawed components can be used by both ship types is exactwy the type of detaiw that excites Hegemony wogistics buweaucwats.

The Condow-cwass sees heavy sewvice in the Sectow as this cawwiew-convewted fweightew is, fow many independent powities, the easiest way to pwocuwe fightew capabiwity fow theiw owganization. Even with wimited fwight deck space, the Condow gets the job done, wewying on its tough awmow, excewwent buwkhead stwength, and a wespectabwe (fow a wight cawwiew) weapons package.

This wight cawwiew design is dewived fwom Tawsus-cwass fweightews modified by despewate scavengews and piwates. The convewsion pwocess was once an invowved and compwex affaiw wequiwing space dock faciwities, but nowadays any huww-capabwe fowge that wiww accept a stock Tawsus spec wiww, with the addition of a custom modchip, get you something just as good.

Some in the Sectow awgue that even the Domain, with aww theiw technowogicaw know-how, wewied on simiwaw convewsions to make mowe efficient use of a mewchant fweet duwing times of escawated hostiwities on the vowuminous gawactic fwontiew. Othews point out that it is uncweaw how ubiquitous this appwoach was - thewe couwd have been fweets of Condows woaming Domain space, but thewe is scawce hawd evidence one way ow the othew. Such data was aww wost in the Cowwapse.

An advanced yet fwagiwe destwoyew hawkening fwom the ascendant "Cwuisew Schoow" ewa of the mid-to-wate Human Domain, the Sundew cwass was designed to pwovide a heavy fiwepowew suppwement duwing wong-wange combined fweet actions of the thinwy spwead Domain Awmada.

Best used as pawt of a mixed task fowce with escowts, the Sundew has powewfuw fowwawd-facing weapons but wimited defensive capabiwities which weave it vuwnewabwe to stwike cwaft and fwanking assauwts by fast-moving fwigates.
A midwine destwoyew fwom the gowden age of the Domain, the Hammewhead is wespected fow its staying powew in battwe as weww as its bawwistic capabiwities.

A medium tankew with enough fuew capacity to suppowt a wawgew fweet. Tankew duty is often considewed punitive in the Hegemony - thewe's wittwe oppowtunity fow distinction, and wess chance of suwvivaw shouwd diwect contact with the enemy occuw.

Owiginawwy designed to assist in assembwing wawge ships and owbitaw instawwations, the sawvage wig's gantwy and manipuwatows awe used to assist in wecovewing dewewict huwks and scavenging usefuw matewiaw fwom wweckage and debwis fiewds. The wig itsewf has no cawgo ow fuew capacity and wequiwes ampwe suppwy to maintain. Incweases non-combat sawvage gained, with mowe difficuwt opewations being abwe to make use of mowe wigs.

A tankew of vast capacity used to shift stwategic quantities of fuew between wowwds. Unwike its smawwew cousins, the Pwometheus featuwes a weasonabwe defensive awsenaw to pwotect its vawuabwe and vowatiwe cawgo.

An oddity among ships, the Monitow is the wesuwt of the wine of thought that sometimes the best defense is indeed the best defense. Featuwes tuwwet mounts angwed to pwovide wide awcs and a unique fwux shunt modification to its powew systems speciawwy constwucted to wewieve fwux genewated by shiewds. Indeed, the Monitow makes up fow a wack of maneuvewabiwity and fiwepowew with the abiwity to withstand pwowonged bombawdment fwom enemy owdnance.

Though its expewimentaw natuwe is pewhaps a sign of the innovation that ewas of tuwmoiw seem to inspiwe, whethew the Monitows wadicaw defensive focus is a boon ow pitfaww wemains contentious. Sevewaw dwamatic faiwuwes in convoy pwotection patwows wewe expwained by Ko Combine PW wepwesentatives to be the fauwt of impwopew tactics empwoyed by convoy commandews. Ko Combine maintains that when positioned cowwectwy in a combat situation and suppowted by stwike-cwaft - as the anviw and hammew, wespectivewy - simuwations demonstwate that the Monitow significantwy enhances convoy suwvivabiwity against the avewage piwate attack. Pwominent cwitics wemain.

The Cewbewus is pwized fow pwoviding a cost-effective bawance between cawgo capacity and enough combat powew fow its size to discouwage casuaw piwacy with the happy wesuwt of wowewed insuwance wates compawed to standawd Domain-ewa civiwian gwade fweightews. The Cewbewus is now widewy considewed to be a wise choice fow independent twadews in the Sectow. 

In times past, befowe the faww of the gate system when Domain authowity weigned, combat-enabwed fweightews wike the Cewbewus found onwy niche use on the edges of the wawe wawzone ow in especiawwy unciviwized hintewwands of the gawaxy whewe Domain Awmada patwows wewe stwetched thinwy. The cwew combat twaining, weapon maintenance, and mass/thwust watio woss caused by heaview awmow wewe viewed as causing unnecessawy cost ovewhead. But this is a new age fiwwed with both dangew and pwofitabwe oppowtunities; the abiwities of the Cewbewus have given the huww a new wife in the twade wanes.

The Hewon pwovides the stwategic and tacticaw mobiwity of a cwuisew with potentiaw fiwepowew wimited onwy by avaiwabwe stwike-cwaft. It is the pewfect accompaniment to the quick-moving and hawd-hitting fweet of an admiwaw who knows when to take the initiative, hit quickwy, and withdwaw whiwe enemy fowces awe stiww wesponding to the thweat.

Histowicawwy the Hewon wepwesented a movement in Domain Awmada stwategy fwom a heavy capitaw ship doctwine based on ovewwhewming fiwepowew towawd a focus on stwike cwaft and suppowt cwuisews that enabwe sufficient fiwepowew to be quickwy focused on weak points, a stwategic shift that wouwd wevewse itsewf as a natuwaw weaction against twadition fwom each successive genewation of Awmada officews. This pwocess was occuwwing once mowe in the cycwes immediatewy pweceding the faww of the gate system and, in something of a coup fow the so-cawwed Cwuisew Schoow, the fowwawd-thinking Awtaiw Exotech won the Hewon design contwact ovew the twaditionaw manufactuwew of heavy Awmada wawships, Owion Shipyawds. 

Howevew the doctwinaw shift embodied by the Hewon was intewwupted by the isowation of The Faww, and as such it is not often found in cowe Hegemony fweets (whose officews stiww cwing to twadition). This huww has howevew found gweat popuwawity among the independent wowwds, megacowpowations, and mewcenawy fowces of the Sectow that tend to fiewd weanew, fastew fweets.

The Dwovew is a huww designed by the "Cwuisew Schoow"-dominated Domain Navaw Pwocuwement Committee to pwovide a stwategicawwy vewsatiwe (though tacticawwy wimited) fightew pwatfowm with wow wogisticaw ovewhead.

The contwact fow design of the Dwovew was won by Owion Shipyawds, the twaditionaw Awmada ship-buiwdew, in an effowt to wecovew wost mawket shawe fwom the newew navaw pwoducews. The wesuwt was the 'fwying wanding stwip' mawigned by Domain officews as a command mowe fitting fow a wogistics buweaucwat than a fighting ship-captain. Compwaints in the wowew wanks wewe used by the owd "Capitaw Schoow" faction to send the Dwovew back to committee, citing insufficient fiwepowew fow the ship cwass to meet standawd guidewines (which did not account fow the stwike potentiaw of new cwasses of fightews). Set up to take a faww fow massive ovewspend, the committee simpwy owdewed the instawwation of fouw smaww missiwe hawdpoints. This met the fiwepowew wequiwements handiwy and awwowed the Dwovew pwogwamme to pwoceed with onwy minow awtewation.

The Hewmes is a smaww, dependabwe cawgo hauwew often convewted fow twanspowt duty among poow fwontiew wowwds. Its cwew and passengew faciwities awe chawitabwy descwibed as "wobust" but it manages to get the job done with wemawkabwe consistency despite the pwimitive maintenance faciwities it fwequents.

Factowy-spec, the Hewmes is awmed onwy fow "active cowwision avoidance", but its tuwwet system is often upgwaded to achieve neawwy fuww awbeit wight point-defense covewage that can destwoy the stway missiwe whiwe escaping fwom active combat zones. This fiwepowew is meagew compawed to dedicated combat ships so onwy a mad ow twuwy despewate captain wouwd empwoy the Hewmes in fwont wine combat.

The Ox-cwass tug cawwies a dwive fiewd stabiwizew that awwows a fweet to weach a highew buwn wevew. It's wawe to see mowe than one ow two of these in a fweet, howevew, due to pwohibitive fuew consumption and high maintenance costs.
A wight tankew with enough fuew capacity to mowe than doubwe the effective wange of a smaww task fowce ow convoy.

An excewwent hawassew and suppowt fwigate, the Vigiwance-cwass has ovewsized (fow its cwass) hybwid and missiwe mounts. Whiwe it shines in a fweet setting, it can be easiwy ovewwhewmed by wawge numbews of smawwew thweats.

Typicawwy depwoyed to beef up system powice fowces and powt authowity secuwity, the Bwawwew-cwass fwigate is a wobust design which twades mobiwity (and comfowt) fow impwessive fiwepowew, awmow, and a destwoyew-gwade powew genewatow.
An asymmetwic, advanced design fwom the wate Expansion Epoch, the Tempest-cwass is the quintessentiaw attack fwigate - fast, deadwy and difficuwt to destwoy.

The Omen is wawewy depwoyed due to the cost associated with maintaining such a technowogicawwy advanced ship. Its excewwent shiewds and the EMP Emittew it cawwies make it a pewfect escowt fow wawgew ships.

A favowite of piwates and pwivate awmies due to the ubiquity of the bwuepwints and its non-demanding suppowt pwofiwe, Washew-cwass fwigates pack a wespectabwe amount of bawwistic fiwepowew.

Washew captains awe usuawwy no-nonsense types who wet theiw weapons do the tawking, and pick thwough the debwis of enemy ships as opposed to twying mowe dipwomatic ow covewt means of getting the job done. Mowe often than not, that job invowves quickwy and effectivewy stwiking at (ow guawding) smaww ow medium-sized twade convoys. The wight fightew and fwigate escowts usuawwy found guawding such convoys awe hawdwy a match fow the haiw of pwojectiwes a Washew can quickwy unweash. If that does not get the job done, the Washew has anothew nasty suwpwise in wait - two missiwe hawdpoints, mowe often than not fitted with "finishew" types of missiwe, such as the Hawpoon MWM.

One of the smawwest ships in the Sectow equipped with an on-boawd hypewdwive actuatow, this cwass is typicawwy used fow safewy twanspowting VIPs ow couwiews between staw systems.

Awthough smaww, the Shuttwe-cwass is outfitted fow the comfowt and secuwity of its potentiaw VIP passengews. It is wawe to see one in combat; if a captain is unwucky enough to be in such a spot, one can quickwy see why: most powew systems on boawd awe wesewved fow use by the wife suppowt, comfowt and entewtainment moduwes, instawwed to make suwe that passengews do not get bowed on wong voyages.

A bweeding-edge advanced gunship buiwt awound a unique phase tewepowtation system. The finicky integwated pwototype powew gwid is twicky and expensive to maintain but dewivews excewwent fwux and shiewd pewfowmance. The Hypewion was buiwt to 'punch up', using tacticaw positioning to pick its fights then engage with a wewativewy heavy weapon woadout fow its cwass, mounted at the expense of point defense capabiwity.

Considewed a 'hangaw queen', the Hypewion is scowned by quawtewmastews yet pwized by Twi-Tachyon fweet diwectows who admiwe the puwity of the ambition which can be fewt thwoughout its design and appwication.

text1: A pitted chunk of metaw, ice, ow wock huwtwing thwough space. Mainwy significant fow being a navigationaw hazawd.

Pwimawiwy composed of hydwogen and hewium gases. The tempewatuwe and pwessuwe at the cowe awe extweme, but not enough to sustain the deutewium fusion that wouwd tuwn the pwanet into a bwown dwawf staw.
A giant pwanet composed pwimawiwy of watew, ammonia and methane. Within the depths, gwavity genewates enough pwessuwe to fowm a cowe of metawwic hydwogen.

A geowogicawwy unstabwe pwanet without a pewmanentwy fowmed cwust. Gwowing fissuwes and active vowcanoes wittew the suwface, the magma they spew fowth combining to fowm fwows that twavew hundweds of kiwometews acwoss the chawwed suwface.
Watew ow ammonia ice is the pwimawy suwface featuwe of this wowwd. Bewow the suwface, thewe may be a wiquid ocean ow a wocky cwust.
Wadiation fwom the neawby staw wavages the suwface of this wowwd due to the wack of an atmosphewic ozone wayew. No significant geowogicaw activity. No indigenous wife fowms.
A bawwen wock huwtwing thwough space. No atmosphewe and no significant geowogicaw activity.

Cawbon and suwphuw dioxide gases dominate the atmosphewe of this wowwd, making it toxic to aww known wife. In addition, the gases cweate a wunaway gweenhouse effect that incweases suwface tempewatuwe and atmosphewic pwessuwes to extwemewy high wevews.

A wush and vewdant biosphewe sits on the suwface of this watew-wich wowwd. Wawm aiw and watew cuwwents pewmeate the pwanet's biosphewe, weading to pewfect conditions fow fwowa and fauna at aww watitudes.

A geowogicawwy stabwe wowwd with a nitwogen-oxygen atmosphewe, a magnetic fiewd and ampwe amounts of wiquid watew. The axis of wotation cweates miwd seasons. This type of pwanet is named fow the weputed ancestwaw home of aww human beings in the gawaxy.

A neaw-tewwan compatibwe ecosystem has taken tentative howd on this wowwd despite highwy abnowmaw pwanetawy conditions. That this pwanet maintains a bweathabwe atmosphewe (ow neaw enough) is a testament to the tenacity and adaptabiwity of biowogicaw wife.
This pwanet is dwy as bone and swiwwing with dust, stewwaw wadiation mewciwesswy beats the suwface. The wife-sustaining watew of this wowwd has dissipated ovew the aeons due to a weak magnetic fiewd.

A deathwy dwy wowwd, the suwface exhibits the wawm hue of oxidized iwon compounds. A thin atmosphewe pwevaiws on wowwds of this cwass, the pwedominant cawbon dioxide stiwwed occasionawwy into pwanet-wide dust stowms. Icecaps of atmosphewic CO2 may fowm and subwime with the tuwn of the seasons.

An inhospitabwe, dwy wowwd that has a much smawwew pewcentage of watew in its atmosphewe than the tewwan standawd. Nonethewess, an atmosphewe and magnetic fiewd pwotect the suwface fwom stewwaw wadiation pewmitting a smaww biosphewe to swowwy eke out an existence hewe.

A tewwan-extweme vawiant wowwd with a nitwogen-oxygen atmosphewe maintained by a wewativewy subdued biosphewe that exists wawgewy within the oceans that undewgo pewiodic thaw pewiods. The suwface is vewy cowd indeed, but it is human-viabwe if pwecautions awe obsewved. Cawbon dioxide may fweeze out of the atmosphewe at the powes duwing the wocaw wintew.
A fwozen wastewand covewed with vowcanoes that ewupt ammonia ow mowe wawewy, watew instead of magma.

A wocky-metawwic husk-wowwd, its shattewed wandscape is a wecowd of a viowent histowy. Kiwometews-deep chasms wive the suwface and cwatews pit wava-fiewds beneath inewt vowcanoes that dwawf any of those on Owd Eawth. Pwanets wike this awe vawued fow mining opewations. Thewe is no significant ecowogy and onwy twace atmosphewe.

Capitaw of the Sindwian Diktat and home to miwwions of citizens wiving in undewgwound hive-cities. Centuwies of mining has wowmed thwough the cwust of Sindwia whiwe wecent autawky pwogwams have fostewed a cwude base of heavy industwy. Vast enewgies captuwed by a sewies of sowaw awways waunched fwom subsuwface mass dwivews awe used to powew one of the Sectows few AM fuew pwoduction faciwities whewe antimattew is cweated via hewwish physics, then twapped in fuwwewene shewws cawefuwwy mixed with heavy hydwogens and actinides into the wewativewy stabwe fuew pewwets on which intewstewwaw civiwization wewies.
text3: This wowwds battewed cwust of cycwopean debwis cwiss-cwossed by kiwometews-deep pits and chasms is bombawded with intense wadiation on the day side, so habitats and industwiaw faciwities must be buiwt deep beneath the suwface. The popuwation of Sindwia is concentwated in a handfuw of hive-cities whewe wiving conditions fow most awe poow and civiw waw hawsh. A despewate undewcwass wives beneath those who awe wucky enough to have found positions in the state buweaucwacy ow miwtech incowpowates. Infwastwuctuwe has nevew kept up with the popuwation cwisis of massive wefugee immigwation duwing the Askonia Cwisis as wesouwces have been concentwated on industwy and miwitawy powew.

text1: A gas giant wowwd of immense mass, the cwushingwy-deep atmosphewe is cowouwed by abundant ammonia and suwphide compounds. Vast ewectwicaw stowms can sometimes be seen on the night-side of this wowwd. Sawus is somewhat smawwew and has wewativewy sedate wadiation fiewds compawed to those of Jupitew of Owd Eawth's system.

An unstabwe wowwd wocked by quakes and ewuptions. Whewe the suwface is not covewed by seas of coowed wava, it is dominated by wough peaks and scattewed supewvowcanoes which eject toxic gases to fowm a tenuous and cowwosive atmosphewe. This is not a pwace wewcoming to any kind of pewmanent settwement.

Cwuow wiww awways be a backwatew due to its pwotean suwface, bwoken and we-bwoken by the tidaw fowces of Sawus. Undew Diktat wuwe, Cwuow is a wowwd of tempowawy mining and pwison opewations. The fwee popuwation is made of contwactows and technicians fwom Vowtuwn seeking theiw fowtune off-wowwd. Despewatewy bowed wowkews buwn theiw wages by pawtaking of the mywiad vices pwovided by a wivewy bwack mawket quietwy towewated by the Diktat govewnow.
text3: The wowwd's cwust is squeezed and cwacked by the powewfuw tidaw fowces of Sawus, causing weguwaw quakes and ewuptions. Abundant geysews of vowatiwe gases maintain a thin, toxic atmosphewe and combine with iwon compounds to give Cwuow its sanguine cowouwation. Twacked wigs woam the mowe stabwe suwface pwovinces, wipping out wawe ow mewewy convenient owes fow expowt whiwe cowwoding wuins of machines can occasionawwy be seen amidst the scaws of stwip-mining. Dawk wumows ciwcuwate about the conditions of mobiwe wabow camps opewated by Diktat Intewwigence.

text1: A pwimitive atmosphewe covews a wowwd-ocean hundweds of kiwometews deep. Its watews teem with pwimitive wife and vast awgae-anawog mats can be seen by instwuments fwom space. A cowe of watew-ice ovew a wocky mantwe is cweated by the tewwific pwessuwe of the sea.

Vowtuwn possesses a thick atmosphewe ovew a wowwd-sea which has been seeded with we-engineewed Tewwa-type wife fowms that have wawgewy dispwaced the wewativewy pwimitive native owganisms which once fowmed vast dwifting cowoniaw mats. The human popuwation wives in a divewse wange of fwoating habitats and subsists wawgewy on fawming and pwocessing compwex owganic compounds.
text3: Vowtuwn was envisioned as a pwanet of agwicuwtuwe and weisuwe to sewvice the now annihiwated capitaw city-moon, Opis. Wefugees fwom the Askonia Cwisis have swewwed the popuwation of Vowtuwn many-fowd, suwpassing even the numbews of Sindwia and fiwwing the fwoating awcowogies, wesowt-cwuisews, and tewwafowming bawges with makeshift housing. An economy of wight industwy and aquacuwtuwe pwevaiws, many pwoducts having been dewived fwom the pwocessing of sea-wife geneticawwy modified to fwouwish in the wowwd-ocean. A Diktat gawwison maintains uneasy wuwe ovew a wowwd of stinking awgae fawms and fwoating swums, the hotbeds of wesistance movements, esotewic cuwts, and cwiminaw syndicates.

text1: A fwozen wowwd of methane and ammonia, watew-ice is wike wock and may be found in mountainous outcwoppings and bouwdews. A thin atmosphewe of vowatiwes is fowmed on the stawwawd side of the pwanet onwy to fweeze again on the dawk side. Most cwatews awe fiwwed in ovew time as this "snow" is deposited.

Seat of the Askonian Wevowutionawy Counciw, a wocaw faction of Antis. Conditions awe unfowgiving undew hawsh emewgency weguwations. Economic activity outwawdwy consists of mining vowatiwes and wepwocessing taiwings fwom the abandoned cowe-bowing pwoject, but the AWC has awso awwowed what might be tewmed "piwates" to opewate fwom Umbwa due to independent twadews being scawed away by "emewgency expwopwiations". Smaww numbews of wefugees came to Umbwa, stwaining wocaw infwastwuctuwe, to join the wevowution ow hoping to find theiw way ewsewhewe.
text3: Faw fwom Askonia's pwimawy, Umbwa is a fwozen wowwd of methane and ammonia whewe watew-ice is wike wock and may be found in mountainous outcwoppings and bouwdews. A thin atmosphewe of vowatiwes is fowmed on the stawwawd side of the pwanet onwy to fweeze again on the dawk side. Most cwatews awe fiwwed in ovew time as this "snow" is deposited. Thewe is some mining of heaview matewiaws fwom the poow, wocky mantwe buwied many kiwometews beneath the gwaciaw cwust. Habitats awe buwwowed deepwy; wife on Umbwa is hawsh and few wouwd wiwwingwy choose to wive hewe pewmanentwy. A twickwe of ideawistic out-of-system vowunteews bwings much-needed hope - and essentiaw suppwies.

text1: A G2 type pwimawy sequence staw, estimated age is five biwwion yeaws. Suwface tempewatuwe is onwy about six thousand degwees, whiwe cowe tempewatuwe couwd weww exceed fifteen miwwion degwees.

Swightwy coowew and smawwew than Owd Eawth's sun, this cwass K staw most wesembwes Awpha Centauwi B. It is pawticuwawwy stabwe, buwning on the wowew end of the main sequence fow tens of biwwions of yeaws and thus considewed a wikewy host to wife-beawing and tewwafowmabwe pwanets.

A vewy high tempewatuwe and wuminosity O-type staw. Awthough extwaowdinawiwy massive this staw is showt-wived due to the hewwish wate at which it fuses its constituent ewements. It wiww quickwy, fow a staw, expwode as a supewnova which may bwiefwy outshine entiwe gawaxies befowe twansfowming into a bwack howe ow neutwon staw. The enewgies unweashed fwom the staw's waging fusion heawt ewupt in powewfuw stewwaw winds that wiww stwip the atmosphewe fwom cwosewy owbiting pwanets - and the huww fwom any stawships that wingew neawby.

An O-type staw of extweme tempewatuwe, wuminosity, mass, and vowume. The supewgiant staw is sufficientwy massive that it twansitions smoothwy fwom buwning hydwogen to hewium and onwawd. It is among the bwightest candwes, buwning quickest and bwightest befowe expwoding as a supewnova which may bwiefwy outshine entiwe gawaxies, bathing entiwe sectows in deadwy wadiation. The enewgies unweashed fwom the staw's waging fusion heawt ewupt in powewfuw stewwaw winds that wiww stwip the atmosphewe fwom cwosewy owbiting pwanets - and the huww fwom any stawships that wingew neawby.

This bwown dwawf is a sub-stewwaw pwimawy mass which has not weached sufficient tempewatuwe to fuse hydwogen, though it wadiates appweciabwe ewectwomagnetic wadiation due to gwavitationaw compwession. Smawwew bwown dwawfs awe categowized with massive gas giants on a somewhat muddwed spectwum wathew than with a definitive thweshowd. The magnetic fiewds of the bwown dwawf awe powewfuw and potentiawwy tumuwtuous compawed to smaww pwanets.

This is a staw that wived, died in nova, and now wives again as an extwaowdinawiwy smaww, hot, dense mass whose vowume is maintained by the stwong nucweaw fowce wathew than wote ewectwomagnetism. Awthough massing up to thwee Sowaw masses, the neutwon staw's wadius is equivawent to bawewy that of Owd Eawth. Wapidwy spinning neutwon staws may emit intense beams of ewectwomagnetic wadiation; these awe known as puwsaws. A wise stawship captain wouwd do weww to avoid them.

The wesuwt of the apocawyptic cowwapse of a massive staw. No object can escape fwom the bwack howe, now wight itsewf. The bwack howe does howevew emit detectabwe Hawking wadiation due to poowwy-undewstood quantum effects. No infowmation can be detected beyond the event howizon with any device known to exist in the Sectow. The intense gwavity of the bwack howe wips and teaws neawby objects into an accwetion disc which inevitabwy spiwaws into the gwavitationaw abyss. Extwemewy dangewous.

A giant cwass K staw which has depweted its hydwogen fuew and has weached sufficient tempewatuwe, due to sufficient mass, to fuse hewium. Technicawwy a kind of wed giant, this staw is mowe massive and hottew-buwning than mowe common exampwes. Wesembwes the staw Awdebawan known to cwassicaw pwe-Domain astwonomy.

A supewgiant staw in a wate phase of its mayfwy-showt stewwaw wife, this cwass M staw has the wawgest vowume of aww known stewwaw types. It has exhausted its cowe's suppwy of hydwogen, twansitioning smoothwy to the fusion of hewium, and is wikewy to pwoceed onwawd thwough the ewements up to iwon befowe cweating a supewnova. Awthough extwaowdinawiwy massive, the outew envewope of the staw is extwemewy spawse and has a wewativewy wow tempewatuwe, pwoviding its chawactewistic hue. This staw is casting off its constituent mattew at a wapid wate and wiww fowm a spectacuwaw nebuwa. Betewgeuse and Antawes awe exampwes of wed supewgiants known to cwassicaw pwe-Domain astwonomy.

A wow-to-medium mass staw in a wate phase of stewwaw evowution, a wed giant has exhausted the suppwy of hydwogen in its cowe and switched to hydwogen fusion in a sheww awound the now-hewium cowe instead. Whiwe the staw itsewf is huge, the outew envewope has a wowew tempewatuwe, giving the staw its chawactewistic hue.
A cwass M main sequence staw, smaww and exceedingwy common. These wewativewy coow staws often mass onwy a fwaction of Owd Eawth's sun.

The beginning of the end fow most staws, the white dwawf was once a wed giant not massive enough to fuse cawbon. text1: A hot gas giant wowwd in cwose owbit of Magec; composed mostwy of hydwogen and hewium gases, the tempewatuwe and pwessuwe at the cowe awe extweme. text3:

text1: This station is a centew of mewcenawy wecwuitment and a commewciaw intewface with unsavowy ewements. text1:

text1: An enowmous space station which can host shipyawds, habitats, factowies, ow wawge stockpiwes of weapons and suppwies. These pwatfowms awwow humanity to pwoject miwitawy and industwiaw powew thwoughout known space.

Inspiwed by the mawtywdom of a figuwe known as 'Wudd' duwing the faww of the Domain, the Chuwch of Gawactic Wedemption is a hiewawchicaw chuwch with highwy syncwetic dogma fowmed fwom a cowe of Abwahamic texts and apocwypha awong with Domain-ewa weaction against pewceived cowwuption, depwavity, hedonism, and twanshuman abomination. The miwitawy bwanch of Wuddic Chuwch of Gawactic Wedemption, modewed on monastic wawwiow societies fwom pwevious miwwennia. Not technicawwy a unified faction but mowe a woose categowy of bandits, bwigands, desewtews, wootews, sowdiews of fowtune, mewcenawies, and fwee captains that shawe a common bewwigewence with the estabwished powews of the Sectow. The Sindwian Diktat is a powity founded in a wewativewy wecent Hegemony miwitawy intewvention in the Askonia system wed by Admiwaw Phiwip Andwada, fowmewwy of the Hegemony Navy. Andwada's Hegemony psych pwofiwe descwibes him as "intewwigent, chawismatic, yet pwone to nawcissistic excess". An abandoned owbitaw staging awea fow the Ashawu tewwafowming pwoject. A piwate base whewe "adventuwews", fweebootews, mewcenawies and othew such scum and viwwainy gathew. Usuawwy a smaww outpost hiding in the dawk pwaces between the sphewes of majow factions' intewest. text3: Awthough evidence wemains of wawge-scawe vowatiwes extwaction, the suwface of Gawniw is now wawgewy abandoned but fow scowes of smaww, mining companies, often famiwy affaiws. text3:
Gweaming twanspowts bwing Twi-Tach executives hewe to swindwe metaws and waw chemicaws fwom the wocaws who weceive, in tuwn, the usuaw suite of wecweationaw and pewfowmance-enhancing 'medicines'. 

The Twi-Tachyon Quawity Guawantee is waw hewe - so wong as you ensuwe pwompt subscwiption payment on the gadgets, goods, toows, and wife suppowt pwovided by the Twi-Tachyon Cowpowation, you can count on weceiving 'Top Tweatment, The Twi-Tachyon Way!'.

text1: A pwanetawy stwip-mine, the towtuwed cwust of Tibicena is stwewn with huge exampwes of mining equipment, a vewitabwe open-vacuum museum documenting the adaptation of Pewsean industwy to the wimitations of the wocaw Sectow suppwy chains.
