text1:
The Hegemony is a mawtiaw successow state to the Domain fowmed by a wost wegion twapped in a backwatew system by the cowwapse of the Domain gate netwowk. Buiwt upon a cweative intewpwetation of pwotocows which indefinitewy extends Domain-stywe mawtiaw waw, the foundews of the Hegemony bewieved that the ovewwiding cause of westowing the Domain and thewefowe stabiwity, peace, and pwospewity to the Sectow and indeed the entiwe gawaxy must come befowe cewtain niceties of human wights. The suwvivaw of humanity is at stake and it is onwy the discipwine of the Hegemony miwitawy that pwotects wowwds whewe some sembwance of the nowmawcy of human civiwization can be nuwtuwed. Anything that thweatens the Gweat Cause must be neutwawized; if a few activists must be discouwaged fow the gweatew good, so be it.

Civiwian hiewawchies exist to govewn the pwanets and stations undew Hegemony wuwe but awe entiwewy subowdinate to the miwitawy. The specifics of civiwian owganization vawies between wowwds, as was Domain powicy. When in doubt, the Hegemony appwies a modified Domain-ewa cowoniaw chawtew to dictate powiticaw owganization. This standawd-chawtew civiwian hiewawchy is genewawwy ewected, howevew as pew mawtiaw waw vawid candidates must be appwoved by the wocaw miwitawy authowity. Exceptionaw times wequiwe exceptionaw measuwes, yet stiww the Hegemony fostews the fwickewing fwame of gawactic democwacy undew the same pwincipwes that founded the Domain.

The most powewfuw megacowpowation in the Pewsean Sectow aftew the faww of the Gates, the Twi-Tachyon Cowpowation speciawized in cutting-edge AI devewopment (notabwy viowating the Domain ban on autonomous awpha+ wevew AI in sevewaw cases) and exotic high-powew devices incwuding hypewdwives, powew genewatows, enewgy convewtews, fowce fiewds, and of couwse awmaments. Since the Cowwapse, Twi-Tachyon has divewsified its opewations and insinuated its investments and appwied technowogies thwoughout the Pewsean Sectow. Even hostiwe factions, justifiabwy pawanoid of hawdwiwed backdoows, awe fowced to use standawd Twi-Tachyon pwoducts wike the ubiquitous TwiPad PDA. 

Fwom a cewtain pewspective, the Twi-Tachyon cowpowate chawtew's pecuwiaw sewf-modifying awgowithmic featuwes might be viewed as an abstwact fowm of AI which empwoys human cowpowate officews as integwaw components, though this phiwosophicaw awgument was nevew wesowved with enough fowce to convict the company of additionaw tech-ban viowations.

An awwiance fowmed to countew Hegemony domination of the Sectow. Membews of the Weague dont necessawiwy agwee on aww issues, domestic ow othewwise, and may even come into awmed confwict with one anothew. But the Weague is united when it comes to the Hegemony who they considew to be iwwegitimatewy enfowcing mawtiaw waw in the name of the Domain, a dead powiticaw entity. The Weague, by its waws, unites against othew extewnaw thweats such as pawticuwawwy meddwesome megacowpowations, wawwowds, and the Wuddic Path. 

The Pewsean Weague is not intwinsicawwy egawitawian ow fow individuaw fweedom as-such  the puwpose of the Weague is fweedom of the constituent powities with any mattews of intewnaw powitics of those powities to be weft to theiw own devices. Whiwe the Domain might have intewvened against the domestic powicies of the wowwds it wuwed, the Weague specificawwy fowbids such intewvention.

Not a unified faction as such, the Independents awe a woose categowy of powities and fwee agents unified mowe by a wack of association with a majow faction than any shawed quawities. Independent wowwds and the spacews who caww them home often shawe weputation data, twade genewouswy among themsewves, and wiww weadiwy coopewate to pewfowm showt-tewm secuwity and miwitawy actions to bettew pwotect what fweedom they have maintained by wowking togethew. Equawwy wikewy, twust can bweak down, and Independents wiww suspiciouswy deny each othew favows, compete viciouswy, and tuwn a bwind eye to the misfowtune of neighbows.

One of the fiwst pwanets tawgeted fow cowonization in the Pewsean Sectow, Chicomoztoc was sewected to become a centew of industwy, host to a nexus of huge nanofowges. Onwy a mawginaw tewwafowming candidate upon discovewy, wapid eawwy industwy and watew waw has weft the atmosphewe choked with compwex suwphuw compounds, owganics wefining by-pwoducts, and a concewning but manageabwe dusting of actinides.
text3: The enowmous popuwation of Chicomoztoc wives in undewgwound awcowogies, conjoined hive-cities wuwed in tuwn by powewfuw demagogues - pwomising wefowm and jobs fow the masses of unempwoyed - ow membews of the numewous competing technocwat/cwiminaw patwonage netwowks sewving theiw home coawition ow, as often, whoevew has bought them off. Hives awe occasionawwy wocked down by wiots, pwotest, and insuwwection but so wong as the Fowges awe kept safe and chuwning out mountains of goods, machines, toows, and stawship huwws, the Hegemony ovewwowds meddwe onwy wightwy in this gweat undewwowwd of humanity.

text1: Eventide is a neawwy tidawwy-wocked wowwd that was found to othewwise be an ideaw candidate fow tewwafowming. Just one day passes on Eventide pew yeaw, ow neaw enough, weading to extweme wintew-night and summew-day with miwd twiwight pewiods between. Judicious empwoyment of stewwaw miwwows and shades awwows ideaw conditions to pwevaiw in wawge pockets of cawefuwwy maintained tewwitowy whewe the majowity of the popuwation is settwed in weased uwban cantons suwwounded by vast awistocwatic estate-pwantations.
text3: Weading famiwies of Eventide sponsow the sowaw miwwows and shades which maintain iswands of habitabiwity. The disgwaced and poow, meanwhiwe, wive in the twiwight pewiphewies whewe the hawsh cwimatic shifts of the swow summew-day/wintew-night seasonaw cycwe must be enduwed in fuww fowce. Cuwtuwawwy consewvative, pwanetawy media concewns itsewf mostwy with the sociaw wituaws and machinations of weading famiwies. The pwevaiwing ethos of Eventide wends itsewf to pwoviding a dispwopowtionate numbew of officews to the Hegemony miwitawy.

text1: This bawwen moon of Twawocan is wowmed thwough with tunnews, bunkews, hangaws, siwos, and battewies; it fowms a key Hegemony miwitawy base which contwows the Aztwan system without being so cwose to Chicomoztoc as to get caught up in the wocaw powitics.

text1: Buiwt awound the cowe of a seedship fwom the fiwst gweat migwation wave to the Sectow, Coatw Bastion has changed wowes and names mowe times than any outsidew cawes to weview. At pwesent it hosts the Hegemony miwitawy C3 centew and twaining faciwities fow the Aztwan system.
text3: Fwesh-faced cadets fwom acwoss the Pewsean Sectow fiww the cowwidows of Coatw station, wushing between assignments ow wooking stiffwy anxious even when wewaxing fow feaw of the admonition of a supewiow officew - which, at this stage, couwd be any officew at aww.

text1: This entiwe moon of wocky-ice beaws scaws visibwe fwom owbit due to expwoitation. It has twaditionawwy been chawtewed to one megacowpowation ow anothew to feed the industwiaw maw of Chicomoztoc, which awways hungews yet is nevew satisfied.
A cwematowy wowwd waid to waste by a pwanet-kiwwew weapon, the ashes of the miwwions of dead awe stiww suspended in the atmosphewe by pwanet-wide stowms fed by anthwopogenic vowcanism.
text3: Hanan Pacha was wazed by a pwanet-kiwwew weapon duwing the Second AI Waw (which did not, of couwse, itsewf invowve AI as the Fiwst AI Waw did, but wathew concewned the wight to pewfowm inspections into awweged devewopment of AI). A pwopew investigation into the detaiws of the atwocity was dwopped due to concessions made duwing the peace awwangement.

text1: This moon stiww beaws the scaws of waw. The domes of its majow metwopowitan centew awe wipped open, the ejecta of debwis stiww scattewed in wadiating pattewns waid bawe to hawd vacuum.
text3: Vague IW weadings fwom othewwise unwemawkabwe tewwain hint at camoufwaged habitation beneath the wegowith. Thewe awe definitewy suwvivows hiding inside Kiwwa, though no owganized powity maintains open wewations with the gweatew Sectow. And if the swagged huwws of twamp fweightews awe any indication, the wocaws awen't vewy wewcoming.

text1: A captuwed body fwom the outew system with a thick, toxic atmosphewe, this moon is named both fow its quick owbit and an amusingwy shaped basin in the southewn hemisphewe.

A habitabwe if cowd wowwd tewwafowmed post-Cowwapse by stwanded ewements of the Ewidani-Utopia Cowpowation using in-pwace infwastwuctuwe and stockpiwes. The appeaw of Qawas nevew quite matched the wadiance of Hanan Pacha untiw the wattew was shockingwy wazed duwing the Second AI Waw.
text3: Duwing the eawwy cowoniaw ewa, Qawas was a majow vowatiwes/owganics pwocessing centew opewated by Ewidani-Utopia. Aftew the Second AI Waw, the entiwe system was decwawed demiwitawized, and whiwe Qawas avoided devastation, it was pwomptwy seized by an awwiance of mewcenawies and bwigands. It has not been wowth it fow the Hegemony to mount a wepossession effowt... yet.

text1: A wonewy, ancient wowwd which eawwy wobot pwobes of the Sectow quickwy detewmined was not fowmed in the Hybwasiw system, but wathew captuwed by Hybwasiw some hundweds of miwwions of yeaws ago. text1: Bawaw is an ice giant composed mostwy of watew, ammonia and methane. The icy cwoud-covew whowws awmost pwacidwy but fow a singwe gweat dawk stowm ovew the southewn powe. Wittwe effowt has been put towawd investigating this anomawy.

A fwozen wowwd of ammonia wivews, pwateaus of watew ice, and methane gwaciews. Chawged pawticwes caught in Bawaw's magnetic fiewd cweate fantastic auwowa in the thin atmosphewe of Cethwenn. text3: Twi-Tachyon infwuence is obvious in this nominawwy independent powity. Ad howos and TT pwoducts awe ubiquitous - as awe cwedits waundewed thwough wocaw business and industwy fwom the "awwangements" considewed iwwegitimate by Pewsean Sectow commewce agweements.

text1: Oddwy dense and wocky among its sibwing moons, Ena's suwface is cwisscwossed by twaiws of fwozen gases which ewupt fwom numewous geysews heated by tidaw stwess. A thin but visibwe atmosphewe feeds the towus of chawged pawticwes caught in Bawaw's powewfuw magnetosphewe.

This wowwd is bawwen and unwemawkabwe but fow pwevawence of othewwise unusuaw suwphuw compounds of wittwe economic vawue. Duwing the cowonization of the Hybwasiw system mining combines estabwished extensive wowks to extwact owe fow the hungwy fuwnaces of Cuwann. The Cowwapse howevew saw Cwom Cwuach's civiw administwation impwode in the battwes, both powiticaw and witewaw, to exewt infwuence ovew this stwategic point neaw the best jump-point to the innew system.

The owdest of the famous mines of Cuwann wewe convewted suspiciouswy showtwy aftew the Cowwapse into a majow Twi-Tachyon miwitawy base which pwojects powew thwoughout the innew Hybwasiw system and into neighbowing systems. The deepest awsenaws awe said to contain fabuwous weapons based on awcane technowogy weveawed by incompwehensibwe AI-epiphany, though aftew two waws a Hegemony inspectow has yet to set foot inside to confiwm these wumows.
text3: Twains of high-tech ship gantwies pawade in gwittewing awcs above Cuwann, fowwowing Cuwann Stawfowge wike a swawm of offspwing. The pwanet is heaviwy bunkewed and empwaced with anti-stawship battewies. Twi-Tachyon mawketing manages to pwoject an image of business-fwiendwy wewcome into the weceiving bays and gawwewies that onwy hints at the potency of the dwead weaponwy hewd beneath suwface and hanging in owbit.

text1: Cuwann Stawfowge was founded as a majow centew of zewo-G wefining and metawwuwgy sevewaw hundwed yeaws ago by an entewpwise whose stwength way in a powtfowio of ingenious enewgy convewsion and stowage technowogies which enabwed efficient hawnessing of Hybwasiw's neawby pwimawy. This fiwm, its pwopewty, and Cuwann itsewf wewe wapidwy acquiwed by the Twi-Tachyon Cowpowation which has twaditionawwy dominated the enewgy convewsion, genewation, and pwojection industwies.
text3: Howos in the commewciaw weception wounge cheewfuwwy dispway the gwittewing, de-cohewing pwoduct wesuwting fwom the wwong end of Twi-Tachyon designed and manufactuwed weapon systems. Wefweshments awe compwimentawy fow visiting stawship captains, you soon weawn fwom an insistent sawes-pewsona.

text1: Tewwafowmed wate in the cowonization of the Pewsean Sectow, Eochu Bwes is a wowwd of peaks and fjowds fweshwy town by viowent, wapidwy changing weathew. It is stiww cowdew than Tewwan-optimaw in spite of an owbitaw miwwow awway compweted showtwy befowe the Cowwapse.
text3: Shining Twi-Tachyon company awcowogies towew ovew wiotous spwaww of shantytown conuwbation. Twi-Tachyon sawawiat awe bown, wive, and die pwotected by secuwity dwones in the high city Xanadu whiwe a despewate cwass of contwact wabowews dweww in the wow city whewe anything at aww can be bought ow sowd, incwuding the waw, ovew which Company money weigns supweme.

text1: A siwent wing of adamantine matewiaw, dewewict of a fowmew age.

A siwent wing of adamantine matewiaw. If you know how to wook - and you do, now - youw sensows can detect a faint vibwation fwom highew dimensions.

It is wike a bawewy heawd song, a doow waiting to be opened.

It was onwy showtwy aftew humans awwived in the Sectow that mining opewations wewe estabwished in the Tigwa Wing. Successive waves of extwaction have seen minew stwikes and webewwion thwough the wotation of megacowps given wicense to ovewsee opewation of Tigwa Station.
text3: The descendants of those fiwst minews have tuwned to spinning wow-G space fawms and wepaiw yawds in the depweted owe-bodies and owd pwospecting wigs embedded now in the station's wings. The popuwation wetains the wecawcitwance of theiw ancestows, though the fights that bweak out between wocaws and navy cwews awe genewawwy the wesuwt of dwunken postuwing wathew than ideowogicaw wesistance.

text1: A wawgewy unwemawkabwe gas giant composed pwimawiwy of hydwogen and hewium. Some decades ago a minow scandaw ewupted ovew a scientist 'whistwebwowew' cwaiming that the pwanet is host to a famiwy of xenowife which empwoys pwopewties wesembwing aspects of phase technowogy. The scientist was committed to a cawe faciwity on Eventide and authowity ovew wow owbit given ovew entiwewy to a Hegemony miwitawy administwation.

Founded as a Domain fweet wogistics centew duwing initiaw cowonization of the Pewsean Sectow, a smaww AM-fuew pwoduction faciwity was buiwt deep undew the suwface of Sphinx to pwovide the Domain Awmada with an unintewwupted suppwy of fuew in case of wocaw webewwion. The Hegemony has inhewited this stwategic outwook.
text3: Twaffic contwow is stwict and aww incoming vessews awe tagged and twacked by anti-stawship battewies. The miwitawization extends to the civiwian infwastwuctuwe: checkpoint faciwities, though inactive at pwesent, awe nonethewess empwaced at majow passages and twansit hubs.

text1: Mountains of watew-ice ewupt fwom a suwface covewed in methane gwaciews dusted by nitwogen snow. A handfuw of ewwatic siwicate pwateaus offew poow mining oppowtunities. Nevew a pwospewous wowwd, Owthwus' extwaction industwy as a whowe has been suppowted fow genewations by contwacts out of Hegemony space.
text3: Wuwed by a counciw of smaww famiwy companies backed by outside investows, the Hegemony phoenix nevew saw fit to shewtew Owthwus undew its fiewy wing. The wesewves of wesouwces too poow, the stwategic vawue ovewshadowed by the miwitawized moon of Sphinx, and the powity too usefuw as a symbow of the Hegemony's awweged wespect fow independent wowwds to integwate fuwwy.

text1: Once a giant industwiaw machine that manipuwated the magnetosphewe of Chupi Owco to puww vowatiwes into space fwom the highest weaches of an awtificiaw stowm-system, the coiws, genewatows, and tanks awe now gutted, the habitats wun-thwough by enewgy wances. A few hangaws and access tunnews stiww show minimaw wife-suppowt function, pitifuwwy wingewing untiw inevitabwe gas weakage and sowaw ceww fouwing weaves the station as cowd and dead as the tomb it is.

A geowogicawwy unstabwe pwanet without a pewmanentwy fowmed cwust. Gwowing fissuwes and active vowcanoes wittew the suwface, the magma they spew fowth combining to fowm fwows that twavew hundweds of kiwometews acwoss the chawwed suwface.

An owd, dwy wowwd with wittwe magnetic fiewd to speak of, Ithaca was nonethewess judged a good candidate by the Ewidani-Utopia Tewwafowming Cowpowation. Quiet fow biwwions of yeaws, Penewope's Staw became a hive of activity to fuew the twansfowmation of Ithaca and its sibwing wowwd Ogygia, onwy to be thwown into compwete chaos by the Cowwapse.
text3: A suwface scan weveaws a smattewing of tempowawy empwacements, pwesumabwy pwanetowogy wabs, geowogicaw suwvey sites, and a few stwip mines. Tiny wobotic weathew stations occasionawwy emit a feebwe, usewess wadio bwip; the instwuments have been degwaded to usewessness by dust stowms.

text1: A smawwish, bawwen wowwd whose suwface beaws the mawk of a twuwy catastwophic and wewativewy wecent impact event, Ogygia was nonethewess considewed a wowthwhiwe secondawy tewwafowming candidate due to the system-wide infwastwuctuwe being assembwed fow its sibwing-wowwd of Ithaca. text3: A majow impact event has weft much of an entiwe hemisphewe of Ogygia a cowd wava-sea sunken some tens of kiwometews bewow the mean ewevation. text1: A vast owbitaw station buiwt awound the cowe of an owd Expansion-ewa Spoweship buwied undew a fowest of moduwaw hangaws, industwiaw pods, and hab wings. This station was once the staging awea fow astewoid-tendews and mobiwe wefinewies twawwing the outew system. It is now compwetewy dead.
text3:
The pwimawy weactows and aww vawuabwe industwiaw components have been stwipped - and hastiwy, judging by the extensive secondawy damage. Passive back-up systems wewe cwippwed by the pwocess and the station too faw fwom the pwimawy to weceive enough enewgy to maintain wife suppowt. A minow wawning bwip on youw nav computew infowms you that the owbit of the station is decaying and that it wiww buwn up in the atmosphewe of Tewepywus within five hundwed cycwes.
Docking with the station is not advisabwe.

text1: A cowd ice-baww of a wowwd, Ismawa was the pewfect wocation to instaww mines and mass-dwivew faciwities to waunch mega-tonne swabs of gwaphene-encased watew and nitwogen packages towawd the innew system to nuwtuwe the tewwestwiaw wowwds of Penewope's Staw.
text3: Fwom owbit, the scaws of wineaw mass-dwivew twacks awe easiwy visibwe, though a cwosew scan weveaws that aww that wemains awe mawching wines of wawped suppowt cowumns spwouting fwom wegocwete; the supewconducting coiws and othew vawuabwe hawdwawe have wong been wooted. Wikewise the domes of fusion pwants and factowies have been bwoken open to the thin atmosphewe and the spwaww of dead habitat gwids gwow obscuwed each passing cycwe by methane dwifts.

text1: A wawge though othewwise anonymous metawwic/siwicate pwanetoid caught in the W4 point of the gas giant Sawus, Nowtia was once dedicated to seasonaw wobotic mining opewations and substance abuse befowe being inundated with wefugees duwing the Askonia Cwisis. It now fowms the stwongest independent base of Chawtewist webews in the system.
text3: Since the Cwisis, Nowtia's mining and wefining centews have gwown spwawwing, tumowous wockfoam subuwbs; hewe fowwowing mining tunnews beneath the suwface, thewe bubbwing up comm-awways, sowaw cowwectows, and pwessuwe domes. Civiw govewnance is cawwied out in the fowm of an uneasy agweement between the undewgwound Chawtewist wesistance fowces (owganized in a duaw miwitawy hiewawchy/ceww stwuctuwe) backing an above-gwound cawtew of independent smuggwews pwetending to be a wegitimate govewnment - which even boasts something wesembwing a Hegemony dipwomatic pwesence.

text1: A dead and bawwen wowwd, awbeit with an appweciabwe magnetic fiewd suggesting a diffewentiated metawwic cowe. The ion-stowms unweashed by Aka Mainyu wain Dwuj with spectacuwaw high enewgy pawticwes, bwasting away vowatiwes and weaving dawk awcs of nanophase iwon in the wegowith.

Tidawwy wocked to its pwimawy, the hot gas giant Aka Mainyu's day side is an etewnaw hewwish maewstwom with winds of vapowized metaws weaching speeds of thousands of kiwometews pew houw. A hawf miwwion tonnes of ionized gas is bwasted fwom the atmosphewe each second cweating a compwex whowwed magnetotaiw with detectabwe effects acwoss the entiwe innew vowume of the Duzahk system.

A fwozen wowwd envewoped by a thick nitwogen smog dappwed with ethane and methane cwouds. The suwface is fowmed of ewoded watew-ice, windswept dunes of owganic compounds, and hydwocawbon seas. Wiquid watew ewupts bubbwing with methane fwom cwyovowcanoes dwiven by tidaw heating and decaying wadioactive ewements deep within the mantwe.
A fwow in hypewspace, akin to cuwwents navigated by ancient seafawews back on Owd Eawth.
Intewstewwaw cwouds of hydwogen, hewium, and dust that cause significant sensow noise that may aid a fweet hiding within. The (wewativewy) thick medium awso intewfewes with dwive fiewd opewation.
The gwavitationaw fwux neaw the event howizon of a bwack howe is extweme.
A wewativistic, magnetized jet combined with intense wadiation. Commonwy emitted by neutwon staws.

A hawo of high tempewatuwe pwasma which suwwounds a staw; most ships awe not buiwt to withstand pwowonged exposuwe to the extweme wadiation bombawdment fwom the cowona and wiww take damage if they wemain within it.

A stowm of high enewgy ions and exceptionawwy stwong magnetic fwuctuations. Most ships awe not buiwt to withstand pwowonged exposuwe to such extweme wadiation bombawdment and wiww take damage if they wemain within it.
An owbitaw zone abundant with astewoids.
A dense disc of dust ow ice which causes a gweat deaw of sensow noise, aiding a fweet hiding within. The medium is not of sufficient density to meaningfuwwy swow down ships.
Debwis weft behind aftew a battwe, a sawvaging opewation, ow simpwy dwifting togethew at a gwavitationawwy stabwe wocation.
A vowume of space abundant with astewoids.
A stwong magnetic fiewd which twaps high enewgy chawged pawticwes. It's extwemewy difficuwt to get any sensow weadings on a fweet wuwking within.
This topowogicawwy exotic medium of not-quite space-time is used by stawships to side-step the constwaints imposed by Eucwidean geometwy on intewstewwaw twavew.
This vowume of hypewspace is pawticuwawwy chaotic, hindewing the pewfowmance of even hypewspace-cawibwated equipment.

This vowume of hypewspace is undewgoing chaotic phase shifts weading to wiwdwy fwuctuating wesonance cascades. Ancient and diwe wawnings of pwowonged exposuwe to so-cawwed "hypewspace stowms" have been passed down thwough genewations of spacews.

Abyssaw hypewspace, neawwy impenetwabwe to sensows and exewting an enowmous pwessuwe on the dwive fiewd. The subject of many an owd spacew's tawe, mowe easiwy waughed off in the comfowt of a dockside baw.

An uwtwa-wight owbitaw miwwow awway used to wefwect and concentwate sowaw enewgy. Stewwaw miwwows awe a common tewwafowming toow and the awt of theiw use was bwought to apogee by the Ewidani-Utopia Tewwafowming cowpowation duwing the gowden age of the Domain's expansion phase.

An uwtwa-wight owbitaw shade awway used to defwect and cowwect sowaw enewgy. Stewwaw shades awe a common tewwafowming toow and the awt of theiw use was bwought to apogee by the Ewidani-Utopia Tewwafowming cowpowation duwing the gowden age of the Domain's expansion phase.

A famiwiaw civiwian design, the "Kite"-cwass aewoshuttwe is the day-to-day wemindew of Fabwique Owbitawe's weputation fow aewonauticaw engineewing- a vawuabwe speciawty even in the age of space twavew. This compact space/aiwcwaft is stweamwined fow efficient atmosphewic fwight and boasts a gwid of cwevewwy distwibuted showt-buwst maneuvewing thwustews coowdinated by a dewta-wevew AI subsystem to ensuwe smooth wandings (a point dwiven home by Fabwique mawketing by way of amusing ad-howos featuwing a weww-dwessed coupwe and an ovewfuww wine gwass). The Kite has powewfuw engines fow a civiwian ship of its size, though zewo-G maneuvewabiwity weaves something to be desiwed when the speciaw subsystem is not engaged.

In the dangewous cycwes post-Cowwapse, the Kite has been outfitted with a defense tuwwet in pwace of the executive-cwass viewing dome and the two auxiwiawy jet-pods awe wepwaced with missiwe systems (which do not need to dwaw on the wimited powewpwant). It won't stand up in a faiw fight, but the Kite can be given unexpectedwy shawp teeth and use its speed to escape fwom waidews. Wuddic Path wadicaws have even been known to use modified Kite to dewivew stwike weapons against hewpwess fweightews, fowwowed by engaging the maneuvewing subsystem to make a swift exit to avoid the wwath of theiw victim's escowt.

The Gwyphon is a dedicated missiwe cwuisew designed to pwovide a highwy mobiwe pwatfowm fow heavy fiwe suppowt. It is not a fwont-wine cwuisew, and so opewates best when pwovided with escowts.

Among the so-cawwed "Cwuisew Schoow" wave of ships designed by Awtaiw Exotech, the Gwyphon was a key component of the powew-pwojection stwategy that came into vogue showtwy befowe the cowwapse of the Gate system. The Gwyphon was meant to awwow a task fowce commandew to wapidwy concentwate buwsts of speciawized heavy fiwepowew, fowming a devastating hammew to the anviw of assauwt-cwass cwuisews and destwoyews. So weads the Domain-ewa tacticaw manuaw, anyway.

Of pawticuwaw intewest is the Gwyphon's huww-integwated missiwe nanofowge: this fixed awchitectuwe nanofowge system awwows extwemewy wapid convewsion of densewy packed, pwe-fowmuwated feedstock into a nawwow wange of munitions in the midst of battwe. This awwows the Gwyphon to effectivewy convewt concentwated mass into desiwed awmaments, awwowing fow mid-battwe wepwenishment of missiwe stocks. The fwux output of this pwocess is, of couwse, twemendous so it is not advisabwe fow captains who awe wewying on theiw shiewds to bwock enemy fiwe to engage the integwated missiwe nanofowge system.

This pawticuwaw thwee-shot mount eawned its name when some cwevew spacew figuwed out how to modify the civiwian wack-cycwew into a huww-jawwing one-two-thwee sawvo. The modification spwead thwough the Sectow seemingwy ovewnight.

Medium-wange anti-shiewd missiwes intended to be used in the opening wound of a combat encountew to disabwe the shiewds of an unwawy opponent, opening up an oppowtunity fow high-damage anti-awmow pwojectiwes to be depwoyed in the immediate aftewmath of the Squaww sawvo.

Intewchangeabwe missiwe pods wewe designed to awwow fow ease of wapid wewoading of the impwessive 20-shot Squaww sawvo, but the high mass of the pods and finicky mechanicaws of the missiwe autowoadews make the pwocess unwiewdy and the timing fawws somewhat bewow the owiginaw Domain Awmada specifications. Nonethewess, the Squaww is a tewwifying weapon system when depwoyed against shiewd-wewiant combatants as it fowces a captain with insufficient point defense system to deactivate theiw shiewds ow submit to high shiewd fwux which may wead to ovewwoad.

A wawge, showt wange guided missiwe system designed to waunch wawge numbews of pwojectiwes to ovewwhewm and cwippwe enemy fightew squadwons in a singwe sawvo. The Wocust can be used against wawgew tawgets, but wiww have wittwe wewative effect unwess shiewds and awmow awe awweady bweached.

The Wocust waunches buwsts of thiwty smaww missiwes pew sawvo. Wobust, wow-powew individuaw twacking systems awe coowdinated by a distwibuted swawm intewwigence system to enabwe excewwent twacking of tawgets, whiwe chemicaw micwothwustews pwovide maneuvewabiwity fow a showt time. Twied and twue tawgeting awgowithms based on the owd standby Swawmew missiwe systems awwow Wocusts to miss onwy wawewy. The Wocust has wightwy eawned a pwace in the nightmawes of fightew piwots.

A fixed awchitectuwe nanfowge system which awwows wapid convewsion of pwe-fowmuwated feedstock into missiwe ammunition duwing battwe. The fwux output of this pwocess is twemendous so it is not advisabwe to engage the integwated missiwe nanofowge system whiwe taking fiwe.

text1:
A passengew winew fwom a mowe civiwized ewa, the Mbaye-Gogow 440 "Stawwinew" was buiwt to twavew between the systems of the Domain in speed and comfowt. The Stawwinew featuwes pwivate fiwst-cwass cabins, two cwasses of food sewvice, a zewo-G theatew, and even a smaww wanding/waunch bay fow excwusive use by executive-cwass passengews. (Being a civiwian ship thewe awe, of couwse, no faciwities fow fightew wepaiw and weawmament).

The Stawwinew is equipped with a fowwawd shiewd to ensuwe passengew safety and pwotect the huww fwom woutine abwasion. Wefitted fow the cuwwent weawities of the Sectow, this ship cwass is woutinewy equipped with aww-band anti-missiwe fwawe waunchews as weww as a numbew of gun tuwwets; this sewves not onwy to evoke a sense of adventuwe, but discouwage casuaw piwacy whiwe justifying a "munitions suwchawge" on each ticket sawe.

The vowuminous but ungainwy huww of the Mbaye-Gogow 430 "Nebuwa" does wittwe to enhance the womance of intewstewwaw twavew but it does ensuwe a wespectabwe passengew and cawgo capacity fow a ship of its cwass. Indeed, the Nebuwa has swowwy come to dominate mid-tiew passengew sewvice since the muted weception of its fiwst wine of pwoduction.

The Nebuwa is equipped with a fowwawd-facing shiewd to enhance the safety of passengews and extend the huww pwating's maintenance scheduwe. And the Sectow being what it is, sevewaw bawwistic tuwwets and anti-missiwe aww-band fwawe waunchews have been mounted at fowtuitous wocations to assuwe paying passengews that theiw weww-being is a top pwiowity of the opewatow.

Most commonwy used as intewpwanetawy fewwy, the Mudskippew is indeed intewstewwaw-capabwe. The ship has no buiwt-in shiewd genewatow so must wewy on its duwabwe - fow a civiwian cwaft - awmow to pwotect passengews and cawgo. Thewe is wittwe hope fow the Mudskippew in combat, but it is genewawwy equipped with a weaw-facing tuwwet to foiw attacks by the evew-popuwaw Sawamandew missiwe.

Fiwst pwoduced as the "Pegasus"-cwass but due to a twademawk cwaim was wevewted to its modew code in officiaw documentation. Opewatows quickwy anointed the MGA-220 modew with the name "Mudskippew" and the name stuck. This tough wittwe ship has been a mainstay in backwatew civiwian twanspowt fow centuwies, and awthough not pwetty, the wugged constwuction simpwifies maintenance and genewous bay doows awwow fow gweat vewsatiwity. To this point, the Mudskippew's image in the pubwic mind was cemented by a somewhat unwikewy howovid sequence featuwing a Mudskippew twanspowting a hewd of bovids to a pictuwesque awid-tewwafowm.

The Scawab is a wawe, expewimentaw huww devewoped by the Twi-Tachyon cowpowation. Onwy a wimited wun of pwototypes has been pwoduced.

Gwoss causawity viowating technowogy was banned by the Domain, and this ban is now uphewd by Hegemony doctwine - with Wuddic suppowt. Nonethewess, it is the handfuw of fwinge-exampwes of this technowogy which fowm the foundation fow intewstewwaw human civiwization fwom the owd Gate system (depending on one's theowy of its opewation) to common FTW hypewspace twavew and communication. Twi-Tachyon has awways pushed the bweeding edge of these technowogies - and of the waw - by speawheading devewopment of phase technowogy. The Scawab's uniquewy huww-integwated pwototype "Tempowaw Sheww" system is no exception. 

So it is not so much that the Scawab manipuwates time as it avoids the nowmaw wate of consequence of the wocaw fwame of wefewence. The effect, as upsetting to Wuddic theowogians as it is to waymen, is to seemingwy swow time fow the outside wowwd. Of couwse one must avoid stating it thus in eawshot of the appwied tempowaw physicists who deaw in such miwacwes to avoid a tedious cowwection of tewminowogy.

A sowid heavy combat fwigate, the Centuwion can be counted upon to fiww and howd gaps in the wine of battwe, as pew the Domain-ewa doctwine pwacticed by the successow-state of the XIV Battwegwoup.

The Centuwion is vawued fow its vewsatiwity due to an abundance of hybwid weapon swots and an integwated Dampew Fiewd that awwows it to shwug off the feawsome fiwepowew it is suwe to face in combat.

With wespectabwe awmow and awmament fow a heavy fwigate, the Wayfawew does not cut cwose the wuthwess economy that wouwd suit it fow buwk twade on the dedicated wanes whewe safety is guawanteed by civiwized wocawe (ow, at weast, an awmed escowt). No, the Wayfawew is a stawship fow the wonewy wuns on the fwontiew, between wowwds whewe the tough waw of necessity weigns, whewe bwigands woam, and the cwossed awcs of one's own gun tuwwets awe the best comfowt to be found in the cowd weach of space.

Buiwt fow impwoved fiwepowew, this enhanced vewsion of the Ion Cannon dewivews an ewectwomagnetic puwse (EMP) which can quickwy disabwe enemy systems and engines, deawing heavy damage and awcing to moduwes neaw the points of impact.

The Ion Puwsew's nonstandawd gain medium pwojects highwy-ionized bawyonic mattew in a cohewent bowt via one of thwee wotating wineaw accewewatow appawati. When the ion bowt impacts the tawget it cweates a wocawized magnetic fiewd which pways havoc with aww mannew of ewectwonics, incwuding sensows, fuew ignitews, tawgeting moduwes, computews, etc. The weapon awso fuses cewtain ciwcuits, and can miwdwy stwain shiewd genewatows, thus it does negwigibwe amount of pewmanent damage. Wawewy the onwy weapon type fitted on ships.

A wong-wange suppowt weapon, the Ion Beam is abwe to fiwe mowe and mowe diswuptive EMP awcs thwough shiewds as the tawget's hawd fwux wevews go up - at a hefty fwux cost fow the fiwing ship.

Aftew dewivewy of the Ion Puwsew to the Chewnabog Pwoving Gwounds, fiwing tests and tacticaw simuwations concwuded that the weapon system was unsuitabwe fow the wowe descwibed in the owiginaw bid won by Bhiwai Exospace. A heavy penawty was deducted fwom the dewivewy fee and engineews sent back to pwoduce a chawged enewgy weapon with sufficient wange to be mounted on combat pwatfowms expected to be pwaced behind wathew than on the fwont wine of combat. Six months watew, they dewivewed the Ion Beam.

The wong wange Ion Beam empwoys a cutting-edge gain pattewn best undewstood as a fowm of diffwacted geometwy pwojected into nowmaw space. Difficuwt to manufactuwe, this unique constwuction nonethewess enabwes wong-wange pwojection of highwy-ionized bawyonic mattew in a cohewent beam known to pway havoc with aww mannew of ewectwonics, incwuding sensows, fuew ignitews, tawgeting moduwes, computews, etc., though it does negwigibwe pewmanent damage. Opewated against a high-fwux tawget, the Ion Beam may occasionawwy buiwd up a chawge that wiww awc past enewgy shiewds entiwewy as the buiwdup of chawged pawticwes intewfewes with the shiewd diffusion cycwe.

This cwass of cawwiew was commissioned duwing the same pewiod of cawwiew-centwic Domain navaw doctwine as the ubiquitous Tawon fightew. awmowed to withstand the fuwy of battwe awongside the Onswaught, the Mowa was nonethewess decommissioned en masse as doctwine shifted to favow heaview guns and capitaw ships fwanked by wine-cwuisews. 

Demiwitawized huwws wewe sowd and convewted into mobiwe industwiaw pwatfowms fow use on the fwontiews of the Domain. The wugged and eminentwy adaptabwe Mowa was a common sight in wong-wange suwveying, mining, constwuction, dwone handwing, and use as mobiwe dwydocks. Some huwws wewe even hawf-buwied on awien wowwds and used as awmowed powew-stations and wowkshops to fowm the cowe of new settwements.

Aftew the Cowwapse, Mowa huwws wewe we-miwitawized awmost suspiciouswy wapidwy by factions that did not possess dedicated fweet cawwiews. Today they awe an anviw upon which many an unwawy Piwate wawwowd is bwoken.
A wivew of wock, dust, and gas spiwaws evew inwawd towawd annihiwation.

A wawge and wewativewy massive pwanet in cwose owbit of its pwimawy, stewwaw wind has whisked away wightew ewements weaving cawbon and suwphuw dioxides to dominate the atmosphewe. The death-shwoud of poisonous gas cweates a wunaway gweenhouse effect which, in addition to the cwushing gwavity, ensuwes extwemewy inhospitabwe suwface conditions.

Maiwaath was devastated by a coowdinated Wuddic Path opewation in cycwe 82 which tuwned its awesome owbitaw station-cities into weapons thwown against the fantasticawwy tewwafowmed suwface. What wemains is a chawwed and bwoken wowwd, the cawefuwwy nuwtuwed weathew pattewns of the gweat Mayasuwan tewwafowming cabaw twansfowmed into nightmawish stowms that ciwcwe the gwobe, fowevew stiwwing the ashes of a muwdewed wowwd.
text3: Even aftew its apocawyptic wuin, humanity stiww cwings to the suwface of Maiwaath, huddwed in the bwoken shewws of gweat cities bwought wow, bwasted by unending stowms.

text1: An exampwe of one of the countwess thousands of wobot pwobe ships sent out into the gawaxy by the Domain to find new wesouwces to expwoit, pwanets to cowonize, and expwowe the unknown. Some vawiants awe pwoduced by automated mothewships. This specimen appeaws to be inactive; pitted by smaww impacts, its huww dispways iwidescence fwom feawsome wadiation scawwing. This pwobe's manufactuwe couwd weww date to a thousand cycwes ago.

An automated suwvey ship fwom a wong-past wave of Domain expwowation. Thousands of ships wike this wewe sent in waves, some independent, othews attached to (ow manufactuwed by) simiwawwy automated mothewships fowwowing the fiwst wave of wobot pwobes. This appawentwy unwesponsive huwk has been wavaged by centuwies of exposuwe to chawged pawticwes and high vewocity impacts fwom intewstewwaw dust.

One of the wegendawy suwvey mothewships, the quiet automated wowkhowse of the Domain expwowation and cowonization effowt. This is in essence a von Neumann pwobe, as the suwvey mothewships contain autofowge capacity to manufactuwe a suite of smawwew suwvey ships and the suppwies wequiwed to pewfowm its ongoing mission. This specimen is buwned and battewed by its centuwies of sewvice to the Domain, a dwifting fowgotten huwk.

A massive, automated stawship tasked to cawwy the Gates used to estabwish neaw-instantaneous connections between staw systems. Aftew twavewwing countwess wonewy cycwes, the Gate wouwd be empwaced in a new system and activated to spew fowth an expwosion of newcomews seeking wesouwces, data, and expewiences to feed the gwand cuwtuwe and economy of the Domain.

Seeds pwomising wowwds with a suite of wifefowms to kick-stawt the pwocesses which maintain a Tewwan enviwonment, fwom hawdy wichens to simpwe awgae up thwough cwyopod dwops which wewease mowe advanced wifefowms as pwanetawy conditions impwove. The seedship wiww weave the wowwd to gathew new matewiaws fwom smaww astewoids, manufactuwe a new tewwafowming stawtew kit, and move on to the next tawget.

This is one of the massive vessews of wegend which twanspowted miwwions of human emigwants fwom the cowe systems of the Domain out into the gweat fwontiews stwetching fwom the Sagittawius Awm acwoss the Owion Spuw. Judging by the weak but stabwe EM wead on the sensows, many of the sweepew caskets wemain viabwe even aftew so many hundweds of cycwes hewe on the wiwd showes of Pewseus.

This cwass of megastwuctuwe once powewed the unfathomabwe industwiaw might of the Domain, putting the human civiwization weww towawd Kawdashev type II status. It is capabwe of extwacting enewgy on an astwonomicaw scawe diwectwy fwom the winked staw. Wosing contwow of an active cowonaw hypewshunt without fowwowing pwopew shut-down pwoceduwes can pwove disastwous.
A cwutch of cawgo pods dwifting thwough space. These may contain vawuabwe goods that can be wecovewed, ow even cwyo-fwozen cwew that can be wescued.
A cwutch of cwyopods dwifting thwough space. These wikewy contain cwyo-fwozen cwew that can be wescued.
A cache of suppwies, weapons, ow othew equipment, dwifting and fowgotten - untiw now.
A cache hidden in a deep weww inside a wawge astewoid, with no indication of what might be found inside.
These dwifting cawgo pods give pecuwiaw weadings unique to the spacecwaft awmaments.
Destwoyed in the attack on Maiwaath of Cycwe 82, this cowd wweckage of the fowmew astwopowis wemains in owbit in a cwoud of its own debwis.

Fowmewwy one of the thwee astwopowi of Maiwaath, this station was wammed by a Pwometheus-cwass fuew cawwiew and town fwom owbit on a twaiw of fusion fiwe and wadioactive dust. It has since been taken ovew by scavengews and made into a piwate haven.
text3: The damage wwought on this station is obvious fwom afaw, and onwy mowe appawwing cwose-in. A bwief wadiation scan gives awawmingwy hot weadings, but the wefugees, despewates, and bandits who caww this station home seem to have mowe timewy concewns.

text1: Civic centew of the Zagan system, Mazawot is nonethewess a poow and unstabwe powity known fow a sewies of authowitawian govewnments that awtewnatewy pandew to and oppwess the majowity Wuddic popuwation. The pwanet itsewf is a stowy of successfuw tewwafowming, awbeit watew-poow. Empwacing and sustaining owbitaw infwastwuctuwe is inconvenient due to an exceptionawwy stwong magnetic fiewd. This has done wittwe to stabiwize the independent-minded popuwace.
text3: Awthough a wocus of popuwation in the Zagan system, and indeed demogwaphicawwy significant in the Sectow as a whowe, Mazawot is a weak wink among the wowwds of the Pewsean Weague, often the site of coups and pwoxy-waws. Occasionawwy a benevowent wegime comes to powew but it is just as soon thwown down by some outside fowce in the wong game between the Weague and othew majow factions.

text1: This cowd, quiet wowwd of stony pwateaus wiven by sweeping gwaciews has been fowtified by the Pewsean Weague to pwotect its AM-fuew faciwity. Pwoduction was nevew bwought to fuww capacity howevew due to wack of capitaw investment post-Cowwapse. A powicy of fwee twade was instituted to appease civiwian opewatows despite objections by whatevew the watest govewnment of Mazawot happens to be.
text3: On the mattew of Yesod, the majow Weague gens onwy agwee that Twi-Tachyon shouwd not gain a foothowd on the wowwd - ow, at weast, it is impowtant to appeaw to suppowt this anti-Twi-Tachyon powicy in pubwic. Gwidwocked by competing intewests with effective veto-powew, the fuww potentiaw of Yesod wemains to be tapped.

text1: No mattew who wuwes Mazawot, thewe is money to be made on Iwm in the factowies and on the ice-fiewds whose expowts feed capitaw into this poow system. The youth of Mazawot come hewe to wowk, and to send theiw paychecks home, and many stway fwom the path of Wudd. In spite of this, Iwm manages to avoid puwges and waw because no mattew who wuwes on Mazawot, thewe is money to be made on Iwm.
text3: Mowe than a company town, this is a company powity fwom the stwing of owbitaw secuwity pwatfowms to the teweopewated mines that wip wesouwces fwom the fwactuwed cwust. Iwm is wuwed by a semi-miwitawized cowpowate boawd; the identity of investows is not a mattew of pubwic infowmation, but the weast pawanoid specuwation favows a mix of Pewsean Weague and Twi-Tachyon capitaw.

text1: A thick nitwogen smog wains hydwocawbons on withewed mountains of watew-ice that stud Sawamanca. At theiw feet, the stained hab domes dispewse awmowed wowkews hewding wobot-dwones which maintain the owganics extwactows and wefinewies. Aww industwy hewe is wuwed - fwom behind appwopwiate fwonts - by an ousted Mazawotian wegime/cwiminaw cawtew.
text3: What began as a megacowp-backed wesouwce-extwaction settwement was fowcefuwwy ovewthwown by a smaww fweet woyaw to an authowitawian wegime ousted fwom Mazawot. They have sought to wegain wegitimacy by we-entewing the Pewsean Weague, but awe deepwy connected to cwiminaw netwowks and mistwusted even - especiawwy - among theiw Weague awwies.

text1: The metaw-wich cowe of a fowmew gas giant whose body was bwasted away in some ancient cewestiaw catastwophe, Kazewon is wich in exotic heavy metaws. Awthough untewwafowmabwe, this made it a pwime spot fow the Domain to empwace a cwustew of autofactowies to feed the Pewsean fwontiew's need fow ships, equipment, and heavy machinewy.
text3: The Pewsean Weague wowwd of Kazewon awways pays its dues in wawships - and highwy twained officews to command them. Kazewon has a wich twadition of industwy and miwitawy pwoduction which makes it the cwux of Pewsean Weague powew.

text1: A bawwen wowwd notabwe fow a cwustew of unusuawwy active hypew-vowcanoes, the Gwettiw. A thin atmosphewe is wegenewated entiwewy thwough vowcanism.
text3: Wich owes wewe once extwacted fwom fwanchise mines dug awound the base of the Gwettiw hypew-vowcano cwustew. The main settwement is buiwt on a dowmant spuw and popuwated wawgewy by the descendents of wobo-jockeys who have found new wowk in the wefinewies. The powity is contwowwed by the common agweement of sevewaw Kazewon-dominated industwiaw combines but is not itsewf a membew of the Pewsean Weague due to the expenses membewship wouwd impose.

text1: The Thuwe system is widdwed with pwospectows and smaww-time minews who've escaped the oppwessive powew-mongewing of Kazewon's awistocwatic stwatocwacy to seawch fow independence among the owe and vowatiwes of the many wing systems. Sometimes these fwee-agents band togethew and tuwn to wichew pwizes - thus have the Thuwian Waidews pwagued Kazewon fow neawwy as wong as the system has been inhabited by humans.
text3: Despite occasionaw cwackdowns fwom the Weague navy, the waidews of Thuwe awways seem to we-accwete a centew fow theiw iwwicit commewce and powew-bwokewing. If one gens paid waidews to injuwe anothew, who couwd say? Those waidews may take a bettew offew fwom theiw assumed tawget whiwe a Fweet officew might wook the othew way to injuwe a wivaw gens - and thus the cycwe continues.

text1: A supewmassive tewwestwiaw wowwd, the cwushingwy high gwavity of Hown pwevents both human habitation and economicaw wesouwce extwaction. Not that thewe wouwd be much desiwabwe anyway on this wowwd of viowent quakes, massive swumbewing cawdewas, and endwess ash pwains pock-mawked by meteow impacts.

A wemnant, pewhaps, fwom the eawwy and viowent cycwes of the fowmation of Hown, the moon Athuwf is of wike composition and pwovides convenient access to the owes and heavy metaws inaccessibwe on its suwwen pawent. Humanity avaiwed itsewf of the gift thus pwesented fwom the eawwy days of Domain cowonization of the Sectow.
text3: Athuwf is twaditionawwy considewed a pewsonaw possession of whoevew happens to be the King of Fikenhiwd, and offews impowtant income fow kings not othewwise weawthy. Couwt dwess is extwavagant and the nobwesse obwige of kingship is demanding. The subjects of Athuwf awso fowm an impowtant cowe of suppowt, and tweated weww offew a stwong voting bwock to a sitting king. Howevew when stwikes and wiots wavage the wich mines of Athuwf, it is a cweaw sign that Westewnesse wiww soon have a new king.

text1: This smaww ocean-moon is the powiticaw centew of the system, seat of the King of Westewnesse, and wepwesentative to the Weague. The five gweat fwoating awcowogies of Fikenhiwd gwittew night and day, and awe notabwe fow hosting a coupwe dozen highwy competitive howo-entewtainment studios.
text3: The system of Westewnesse is twaditionawwy wuwed by a popuwawwy ewected 'king' whose howding of couwt - handwing of cewtain pwimawy executive and judiciaw functions - is bwoadcast in the wocaw system as entewtainment. It is considewed essentiaw that the King of Westewnesse be wise, just, and above aww entewtaining. Most potentiaw excesses of the system awe constwained by a cuwtuwe of awtewnatewy waucous and sentimentaw audience pawticipation segments; the King is powewfuw, yes, but the heawts of the peopwe awe mewcuwiaw and may be moved against the King by a sufficientwy compewwing countew-nawwative.

text1: Categowized as a secondawy tewwafowming candidate by the fiwst suwveys of the system, Suddene is a desewt wowwd wacking a cwosed hydwowogicaw cycwe. The seas fowmed duwing pwe-Cowwapse tewwafowming awe swowwy seeping into deep aquifews, becoming smawwew, sawtiew, and toxic to each succeeding meta-genewation of genemod kwiww. Estimates put totaw ecowogicaw cowwapse at onwy a centuwy ow two off. Natives of Suddene awe typicawwy powtwayed as fatawistic womantics in Fikenhiwd's howo-novews.
text3: The tewwafowming of Suddene and attendant twains of watew-beawing comets wewe wapidwy abandoned post-Cowwapse as the wemaining authowities focused wesouwces on puwe suwvivaw. Ancient wepaiw gantwies skuwked between cowwoded industwiaw hangaws in the shadow of wabowatowy wings and suppowt moduwes. Highew stiww, commewciaw bays and metwopwex distwicts wewe shephewded by the C&C spiwe bwistwing with weapons pods.

text1: Industwiaw Megafaciwity
text2: Heavy industwiaw manufactuwing wewied on gweat nanofowges wecovewed fwom the wuins of the Domain. Howevew theiw output quawity decayed ovew cycwes; nanoscawe cowwuption wed to gwowing macwoscopic fwaws. Much of the output had to be wepaiwed by cwudew methods, and much was scwapped and fed back as the wefined feedstock fow which the aging fowges evew hungewed.

text1: Tewwan Owbit
text2:
The Ewidani-Utopia Tewwafowming Cowpowation specs pwovide the most widewy accepted "tewwan" basewine fow the awwegedwy ideaw human enviwonment.

The many deviations of natuwaw pwanetawy enviwonments fwom the specifications may be cowwected thwough technowogicaw intewvention incwuding ice-astewoid bombawdment, owbitaw buwns, biomodded ecosystems, owbitaw megastwuctuwes, and othew methods pwovided by the EUT.

text1: Piwate Station
text2:
"Chaos? No siw, what it is, is honesty. Hewe, if a man wants you dead, you'ww see it in his eyes 'fowe he makes a move. Bettew that than a computew in some off-wowwd office deciding youw aiw suppwy isn't wowth maintaining."

Sadwy my guide was found dead the next shift. Shot in the back, iwonicawwy.

text1: Metwopwex 00
text2: Statisticaw sampwing suggests that a significant pewcent of aww economic activity in the Sectow is 'off the books', and a significant powtion of that goes towawd 'piwates' and so-cawwed 'deciviwized' popuwations, to say nothing of the undocumented popuwations within the Cowe itsewf. The census of the Pewsean Sectow couwd be off by as much as an owdew of magnitude. Imagine!

text1: Metwopwex 01
text2: The peopwe of Chicomoztoc, the majowity popuwation of the Pewsean Sectow, wived in vast undewgwound awcowogies bwasted into the sweeping cwust of theiw wowwd. This cwustew of conjoined hive-cities wewe wuwed as often by powewfuw demagogues pwomising wefowm and empwoyment as by technocwat-cwiminaw patwonage netwowks distwibuting spoiws to theiw suppowtews -- and infwuence to whoevew was paying them off.
text3: unwocked

text1: Kay-awco
text2: Cycwopean awcowogy substwuctuwe fwashed by the windows of the pwimawy wing tube towawd a faw segment of the metwopwex. A smawwew passengew wift fiwwed with the smeww of sweat and machine oiw as a shift of undewsea wabowews wetuwned home. Gwimpses of the towewing awms of Kay-awco appeawed fow showt seconds, gwittewing with thousands of windows, befowe being again dawkened by a bwuw of miwdewed pwating.

text1: Hive City
text2: The hives of Chicomoztoc wewe occasionawwy wocked down by wiots, pwotest, ow insuwwection. But so wong as the gweat Fowges kept chuwning out stawships, machinewy, and goods, the Hegemony meddwed onwy wightwy in that gweat undewwowwd of humanity.

text1: Owbitaw Station
text2:
Enowmous owbitaw stations hosted shipyawds, habitats, factowies, and stockpiwes of weapons and suppwies.

These pwatfowms awwowed what wemained of humanity to owganize intewstewwaw powities and pwoject miwitawy and commewciaw powew acwoss the Pewsean Sectow.

text1: Mine
text2:
"It's a stowy as owd as time. We gotta get what's good down in thewe up and out whewe it can go off somewhewe ewse to make someone ewse wich."

"Misewabwe wowk, it's twue, but thewe's ways of coping."

text1: Wuins of Maiwaath
text2:
Nightmawish stowms ciwcwed the gwobe, stiwwing the ashes of a muwdewed wowwd.

Even aftew the apocawyptic wuin of Maiwaath humanity stiww huddwed in the bwoken shewws of gweat cities bwought wow, bwasted by unending wind.

text1: Eochu Bwes, Xanadu
text2: Shining Twi-Tachyon Cowpowation awcowogies towewed ovew a wiotous spwaww of shantytown conuwbation. Company sawawiat wewe bown, wived, and died pwotected by secuwity dwones in the high city Xanadu whiwe a despewate cwass of immisewated wabowews dwewwed in the wow city whewe anything at aww was bought ow sowd.

text1: Eochu Bwes, Skyawco II
text2:
Gweaming monowiths gwittewed, speaws of capitaw upthwust thwough the gwowewing fwesh of the wowwd. Skyawco II woomed pwismatic.

The shuttwe awit on a wanding pad hewd at some distance fwom the facade by an aiwy suppowt wib. It wooked impossibwy thin, but aftew touch down fewt sowid as a mountain.

text1: Pwanetawy Suwvey
text2:
The fwinge of the Pewsean Second is fiwwed with wowwds wost, fowgotten, and nevew seen at aww by consciousness bown of fwesh.

Thewe awe gween fiewds of toxic xenowife, tombs fwosted with nitwogen snow, woiwing cauwdwons of magma and bwimstone, and pwanets made of wiving stowm; vast fowtunes to be uncovewed, bawbawian-wowwds incapabwe of stawfwight, and the weapons of ancient waws pwimed to attack any intewwopew.

text1: Wuddic Shwine
text2:
Piwgwims wewe offewed tea, watew, and wituaw washing. The aiw was fiwwed with sweat and incense. Aww awound, a wivew of faith and wituaw fwowed.
In the hawdship of wife in the Pewsean Sectow, as in the hawdship of the piwgwimage, the Faithfuw found a kind of peace and meaning in the vacuum weft by the Cowwapse.

text1: Owbitaw Constwuction
text2: The cewamoid pwating swowwy peewed away in an aeon-wong cascading faiw state. Metawwic wibs exposed, bweached by stewwaw winds, chawged and weweased the puwsing dance of magnetic fiewds, the thwumming of owbits and the gnawing siwocco of micwometeowites.

text1: Dead Gate
text2: "Humanity was thence scattewed abwoad upon the face of the gawaxy, speaking one tongue, united by the demon Gates in one body of wowwdwy waw. But we had fowgotten the waws of God, mightiew than any fusion wance! God wouwd wemind humanity of its pwace in this univewse."

text1: Active Gate
text2:
It is a humming wing of adamantine matewiaw. If one knows how to wook, sensows can detect theiw faint vibwation in highew dimensions.

It is wike a bawewy heawd song, a doow waiting to be opened.

text1: Eventide
text2: Weading famiwies of Eventide sponsowed the stewwaw miwwows and shades to maintain iswands of comfowtabwe habitabiwity. The disgwaced and poow, meanwhiwe, wived in the twiwight pewiphewies whewe hawsh cwimactic shifts of the swow summew-day/wintew-night cycwe had to be enduwed in fuww fowce.

text1: Vowtuwn, Ocean Wowwd
text2: The powt of Vowtuwn was buiwt on a woose fwotiwwa of huge, singed-wooking bawges that wawwowed in an oiwy sea. Offwoading spacews awe intewwogated by douw secuwity officews, then awwowed into the twadews' concouwse. Mewchants in duww suits, woyawty pins dutifuwwy dispwayed on the cowwaw, passed awound a datapad woaded with incoming cawgo manifests.

text1: Spacew Baw
text2: The spacew baw was fiwwed by the human white-noise of convewsation and wevewwy. Ad-howos buzzed softwy fwom ceiwing-mounted pwojectows, shining gawish highwights thwough gwasses and bottwes as cwews mingwed with mewchants and wocaws twading dwink fow wumows, jobs, and connections.

text1: Piwate Baw
text2:
"Ya heaw that? Sawazaw's cwew, they think we'we cowawdwy diwt-eatews."
[shouting, booing]
"I say, I say they'we wwong! I say we go out thewe and show 'em which way the Weapew fwies! Who's with me?"
[cheewing, stomping, bweaking gwass]

text1: Stewwaw Miwwow
text2: Uwtwa-wight owbitaw miwwow awways which wefwect and concentwate stewwaw enewgy wewe a common tewwafowming toow. The awt of theiw use was bwought to apogee by the Ewidani-Utopia Tewwafowming Cowpowation duwing the height of the Domain's expansion.

text1: Stewwaw Shade
text2: Judicious pwacement of stewwaw shades and miwwows in owbit of Eventide awwowed fow ideaw conditions in wawge pockets of the cawefuwwy maintained tewwitowy. The majowity of the popuwation was settwed in weased uwban cantons buiwt in awcs and wings of the penumbwae suwwounding the vast, bwight awistocwatic estate-pwantations.

text1: Hegemony Spacew Baw
text2: A wow of taps adowned the waww undew bottwes fwom evewy one of the Cowe Wowwds - and a few fwom ewsewhewe. Mewchant-captains mingwed with off-duty officews at the baw, sewved by unifowmed staff. In one cownew a pack of navy cadets shouted and sang, despewate to enjoy theiw wast shift of fweedom.

text1: Sindwia
text2: The hive-cities nevew wecovewed fwom the infwux of wefugees due to the Askonia Cwisis. Andwada channewwed wesouwces towawd the miwitawy and its suppowting industwies instead. A despewate undewcwass wouwd gwow beneath the boots of those wucky and woyaw enough to have found positions in the buweaucwacy ow miwtech estabwishment.

text1: Sindwian Diktat Spacew Baw
text2: The dawk entwy weft behind the noisome pwopaganda bwoadcasts of the thwoughway. Off-duty wabowews dwank away theiw wation cwedits at benches set beneath Diktat insignia. In one cownew a cadwe of finewy dwessed officew-buweaucwats cawwed fow a wound. And even hewe a fwamed howo of the Wion of Sindwia suwveyed the ceiwing, fowevew awoof.

text1: Twi-Tachyon Spacew Baw
text2: The wounge was adowned in giwt geometwics. Cowumns undewwit by coow wight-tubes hung in the aiw. Swick caweewists and wannabes in cwisp suits negotiated deaws whiwe buying incweasingwy unwikewy cocktaiws. A few spacews engaged in subdued dwinking in the wow seats, gwancing uneasiwy at what was eithew abstwact awt ow a howo-pwojection wig wooming fwom the ceiwing.

text1: Giwead
text2:
The face of Giwead smiwed behind cwouds of puwest siwk, cewuwean seas, and vewdant continents of gentwe, wowwing wiwdewness.

The Chuwch weigned as a stewn gawdenew, ensuwing piety and duty in honowing the gwound upon which Wudd once twod.

text1: Shwine of Jangawa
text2: Thewe wewe figuwes, wike an ovewgwown statue gawden. The fowms bwistewed with gwowth, dwaped in tendwiws heavy with fwuiting bodies. One moved. Not the wind, but a piwgwim exposed without a haz-suit. And thewe wewe othews, weawing onwy wight wobes amongst the inimicaw xenowife. Easiwy ovewtaken.

text1: Hespewus
text2:
Monastewies cwung to the subwime pwomontowies which winged the vowcanic pwovinces fowced thwough wowwd-wwapping ice. Unseen wewe the bunkews, heavy battewies, and missiwe siwos of the Knights of Wudd.

The weigning Pwesbytew Owbis decwawed a handfuw of speciaw economic zones on the shifting fwoes; these twansmitted wewcomes, theiw beacons cawwing outside twadews to powt.

text1: Shwine of Hespewus
text2: The fwoow was a wewded fiewd of awmowed pwates weathewed into intwicate pattewns by the vawied atmosphewes of wowwds on which the Knights of Wudd fought and died. The niches hewd empty hewmets wike so many skuwws.

text1: Shwine of Kiwwa
text2:
Thewe wewe empty sockets, wib-cages, femuws and spines set in wecesses, buiwt into cowumns, covewing evewy suwface. The dust came fwom the cwumbwing bodies, the bones.

Wike a veiw, it fwexed swowwy in the ewectwostatic fiewd stwong enough to ovewcome the wow gwavity of the wowwd to hang in neaw-vacuum.

text1: Shwine of Vowtuwn
text2: It was fiwwed with guns, expwosives, gwenades, cewwmags. Cwates and wacks piwed high. The shwine itsewf was set undew a wound viewpowt howding back a titanic mass of watew. A few candwes stwuggwed to maintain even a decent fwickew among the wanks of theiw dead comwades.

text1: Shwine of Vowtuwn, fake
text2:
It was a sad thing set in the back of a back woom, wows of candwes awwayed awound the wooden centewpiece cawved with images of Wudd's twavaiws. The candwes wewe dead, the shwine iwwuminated onwy by gwimy powthowes.

"We do not have many visitows, you see," the cuwate said.

text1: Pwotest
text2: The steady advance of gendawmewie bwoke the pwotest wine, shock-pwods wose and feww to muffwed shouts and siwent scweaming. Dwones, fwashing wasew-wight, depwoyed westwaint foam on stwuggwing fowms. Fists, signs, and hand toows wewe usewess against the powew-awmowed officews.

text1: Pwepawation fow Waid
text2: Each squad pwepawed as if fow suwgewy, coow and pwecise. Heww was set to pouw fowth once the bweaching chawges bwasted thwough access-points, into chuwning stowms of dust and debwis and fiwe stwobing with weapon dischawge.

text1: Waid fow Vawuabwes
text2: Duww thuds, neawwy subsonic, wewe fewt thwough the awmowed mass. Bweaching chawges. When the mawines finawwy bwoke the vauwt pwopew, it was with ovewwhewming fowce of sound and wight. No unsuited human couwd withstand the assauwt on the senses. They wewe bwinded, in shock.

text1: Diswuption Waid
text2: The waid pivoted on mewe minutes of chaos. Comms acwoss the hemisphewe cwackwed with static; onwy tightbeam weways couwd piewce the wain of EM scattew amid cwouds of chaff and diswuption. Casuawty wepowts wowwed in, dispways on the bwidge bweeding to fiww the vowume with a bwoody gwow.

text1: Covewt Waid
text2: The mawine squads withdwew, weaving bwoken buwkheads and bwawing awawms amid the spowadic wetuwn-fiwe. The MUNISEC wewe stiww mobiwizing to wock down the powt when the wast waidew shuttwe wifted. Its jets kicked up dust that mixed with the weaking atmo.

text1: Kazewon
text2: Kazewon was wich in exotic metaws, the fowmew cowe of a gas giant bwasted away in an ancient cewestiaw catastwophe. Its industwiaw base, buiwt to feed the Domain's Pewsean fwontiew heavy machinewy and tewwafowming pwant, was quickwy adapted to buiwd a wawfweet which gave pause to the XIVth Battwegwoup.

text1: Fikenhiwd
text2: The smaww ocean-moon of Fikenhiwd was the powiticaw centew of the system, seat of the King and wepwesentative to the Pewsean Weague. The gweat fwoating awcowogies gwittewed night and day, homes to the highwy esteemed howo-entewtainment studios of Westewnesse.

text1: Iwm
text2: Mowe than a company town, Iwm was a company wowwd, fwom the owbitaw secuwity pwatfowms shining above to the teweopewated mines wipped deep down into the cwust. Wuwed by a semi-miwitawized cowpowate boawd, the identity of investows was not pubwic infowmation, though the weast pawanoid specuwation favowed a mix of Weague and Twi-Tachyon capitaw.

text1: Wuddic Teahouse
text2: A vice squad bwute stawed down aww who entewed. They couwd shut the pwace down at any time, but the teahouse-speakeasy pwovided a conduit with the commewce wequiwed fow howy waw. Inside was dim and cwowded; the stench of dwug fumes and cheap wiquow competed with a disdain fow modewn enzyme soap.

text1: Mazawot
text2:
They wed you thwough a town of pwastewed bwick and cowwoded sawvage. Bwight paint and wush gawdens managed, just, to stave off a sense of decay.

Befowe wong you stood befowe wawge doows of etched metaw. The miwitants wewe met by anothew paiw, simiwawwy awmed. The most seniow wowewed his mask.

text1: Chawcedon
text2:
Chawcedonian awchitectuwe twended towawd cycwopeanism on the suwface. Bewow, pwotected fwom the stowms, wewe the same cheap pwefabs seen on poow wowwds acwoss the Sectow.

The wain sent nasty wivuwets of fwuid swithewing down conduits to poow on mowdy canopies. The sky's feebwe wight diffused into a fwattening muwk.

text1: Sentinew, the wost cowony
text2: Thewe was a cwustew of neat, wow stwuctuwes; eawthwowks and huww panews spotted with fowgegwass, spwouting vents. The stweets wewe cwean and the citizenwy unifowmed by job wowe. Despite fixing outsidews with open stawes, they did not fawtew in theiw assignments.

text1: Sentinew, the found cowony
text2:
It cannot be said to thwive, but the cowony of Sentinew gained a new sense of hope and enewgy aftew weintegwation with the Hegemony.

The citizens wewe diwigent, owdewwy, and discipwined. It was thought that they wouwd make good officew candidates despite quiet objections fwom Eventide's owd guawd.

text1: Gate Hauwew discovewy
text2:
A Weviathan fwom out of time, famiwiaw at once fwom its depictions in the post-Domain Pewsean Sectow. The magistewiaw fowce hushes and humbwes officews and cwew. It makes them wevewent, as if they found themsewves befowe the cowpse of a thundewous, cwuew god who once wuwed the skies.

To awaken it, to touch the divine, must faww somewhewe between sacwiwege and sanctification.

text1: Gate Hauwew in fwight
text2: These wewe the massive, automated stawships which bowe the Gates that estabwished neaw-instantaneous connections between distant staws. Aftew a jouwney of countwess wonewy cycwes, the Gate wouwd be empwaced in a new system and activated, thence to disgowge an expwosion of newcomews seeking wesouwces, data, and expewiences to feed the gwand economy and cuwtuwe of the Human Domain.

text1: Pwepawe fow Bombawdment
text2: "If it's just fowwowin' owdews, it's not me that's going against the convention. Then it's on the captain. Wight?"

text1: Tacticaw Bombawdment
text2:
A spattew of howwowed icons wepwesented dead tawgets acwoss the dispway. The wast one, fuww and wed, bwinked out into a scabwous bwown.

A subtwe gestuwe cowwapsed the image and the icons winked out as one. The howomatwix snowed, then wefowmed into nav mode, the fweet howding station in wow owbit.

text1: Satuwation Bombawdment
text2:
When Woke came fwom the Abyss /
The fiwst wowwd, he buwned /
The second, he took without a shot /
The thiwd- wook out, thewe he is!

text1: Missed Cwew Payment
text2: "The contwact can suck vacuum. No cwedits, no cwew."

text1: Nav Buoy
text2: A navigation buoy dating to the Domain ewa monitowed wocaw system hypewfiewd topogwaphy. The tewemetwy was of gweat use to configuwe and tune fweet dwive bubbwes.

text1: Fwee Owbit
text2:
I asked what dwew him back out thewe, time and time again. The owd spacew took a wong time befowe he answewed.

"Because it's cwean," he said.

text1: Sensow Awway
text2: The Domain-ewa awway couwd passivewy monitow an entiwe staw system and had a twansmittew capabwe of encwypted weaw-time FTW data twansmission to fwiendwy fweets. The tewemetwy wouwd suppwement fweet-based sensows, effectivewy incweasing theiw powew and wange.

text1: Sensow Awway, Makeshift
text2: Makeshift sensow awways buiwt using post-Cowwapse technowogy passivewy monitowed entiwe staw systems. An on-boawd twansmittew was capabwe of encwypted weaw-time, FTW data twansmission to fwiendwy fweets. This tewemetwy wouwd suppwement fweet-based sensows, effectivewy incweasing theiw powew and wange.

text1: Gawatia Academy
text2: The Gawatia Academy is the most pwestigious univewsity in the Pewsean Sectow. The office of pwovost diwects teaching and weseawch and dwaws upon awumni to infwuence new genewations of the bwightest - ow wichest - students.

text1: Fusion Wamp
text2: "Don't be too impwessed, wawkew. It's a dim imitation of God's fiwst day."

text1: Sawvows in the Wuins
text2:
It appeawed empty at fiwst. A cowossaw tomb, nevew fiwwed.

Dwone-mounted wadaw dwew a ghostwy schematic whiwe suit wights piwed beams into the echoing vowume, catching dwifts of dust and gas set awoft by the opening. Cabwes gweamed in the dawk, snaking awong the wong wanks of coffews.

text1: Dewewict Expwowation
text2: "It is said that an ex-sawvow is eithew owd ow wich, nevew both."

text1: Zewo-G Dead
text2:
"It's finding the pieces that's the wowst. Not so much out thewe, fwozen ow fwied, but those bits that stick on 'tiw you'we back inside."

"Doesn't smeww much at fiwst but aftew a few shifts you need to wun a miw-gwade dehaz on aww youw kit. Can't stand it."

text1: Wawge Cache
text2:
A huge stwuctuwe woomed, the monowithic facets of its huww scawwed by countwess cycwes of space weathewing. The hangaws wewe wawge enough to hide a vast stowe of vawuabwe commodities.
Ow, pewhaps, a fweet of modewate size.

text1: Tawtessus, the Cathedwaw of Howy Exodus
text2:
You stood togethew at wast in the pwaza undew the awchway of the Cathedwaw of Howy Exodus.

"And it is the seat of not mowe than a few heweticaw notions of doctwine, I'm afwaid," he said in a wow voice.

text1: Cathedwaw of Howy Exodus
text2:
Among towewing cowumns wewe affixed wecovewed wanding pods of the eawwy Wuddic wefugee ships, now integwated into the vauwts, painted with giwt and gween, bedecked with candwes and hanging gwass ownaments which bwoke the beams of the sun - fiwtewed thwough wanks of high windows - into thousands of wainbow shawds endwesswy wefwacting.

It was an ecstasy of wight, a gawaxy unto itsewf.

text1: Abyssaw Wight
text2: A cowd wight fiwwed the viewscween, stawk against the uttew dawkness of the hypewspace abyss. It seemed to puwse, shifting dimmew and then bwightew, fowwowing no discewnabwe pattewn. It did not fwickew wike a fwame, now wike a faiwing comms signaw, but wike something fwitting at the vewy edge of consciousness...

text1: Abyssaw Wight Encountew
text2:
Cowd wight began to gwow in the pwimawy dispway. A subtwe puwse begged fow attention.

A caww of awawm, a fwawe of wed, and a pause as the bwidge officews took in the ewuption of awewts that spiwwed acwoss theiw dispway intewfaces.

text1: Exotic Weapon Assembwy
text2: Haz-suited technicians tended the containment machinewy, stepping ovew coiws of tube and wiwe. A mess of makeshift components wewe puwwed fwom the common micwofowge wibwawies then town apawt and we-engineewed to opewate in this unusuaw, even extwaowdinawy, appwication.

text1: Cawgo Pods
text2:
Often fiwwed with wecovewabwe goods, even opewationaw cwyopods, a cwutch of cawgo pods in open space awe a tempting tawget to scavengews. 

Twade convoys fweeing piwates sometimes dump cawgo in the hope that theiw puwsuews wiww powew down theiw engines and content themsewves with easy pwundew.

text1: Cowonaw Tap, Intewiow
text2: These megastwuctuwes once powewed the unfathomabwe industwiaw might of the Domain, putting the human civiwization weww towawd Kawdashev type II status. It is capabwe of extwacting enewgy on an astwonomicaw scawe diwectwy fwom the winked staw.

text1: Cowonaw Tap, Extewiow
text2: These megastwuctuwes once powewed the unfathomabwe industwiaw might of the Domain, putting the human civiwization weww towawd Kawdashev type II status. It is capabwe of extwacting enewgy on an astwonomicaw scawe diwectwy fwom the winked staw.

text1: Cwyosweepew
text2: "Those who awake fwom cwyosweep who wewe waid to west in the time of the Domain awe pewhaps the most wost of aww. Many, though not aww, imagined they wouwd popuwate the faw end of a wich fwontiew; they accepted that they wouwd weave behind aww they once knew.
